Job Description:
Responsibilities: 
• To support Marketing Manager and Retail Operation Team.
• To develop marketing activities that builds the responsible brand.
• To develop brand communication plan and ensure copy strategy development aligns with brand footprint.
• To ensure effective management of project including new product and tactical promotion.
• To manage admin jobs as per marketing manager assigns.
Job Requirement:
Qualifications:
• Bachelor degree in marketing or relevant feilds. 
• Excellent in English Communication Skills (Speaking, Writing, and Reading).
• Experience in Fashion at least 1 year in fashion business, retail, operations, Marketing Event, Marketing POS.
• Computer literacy PowerPoint for Presentation, Excel, Word.
• Innovative thinking, Initiative, Proactive.
• Willing to travel.

APPLICATION INFORMATION:

Contract type: 6 months (possible to extend)
We offer a competitive remuneration package to the right candidate. Interested applicants, please submit your application with a complete resume detailing experience, qualifications, present and expected salary, phone number and email address to kh-hr@jpsfashions.com or contact 098 345 292.

Only shortlist candidates will be contacted
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Canadia Tower N/A

management.

Company Profile: TUBE COFFEE created by 3 Cambodian Shareholders. Tube is inspired by London’s metro system, the underground TUBE, for which its fast speed, reliable quality, and affordability are world-renowned. Naturally, these are the very essence which Tube coffee strives to be. We aim to bring fast, affordable, and quality services to Cambodia just like our underground counterpart, but in a coffee way. As synonymous as the tube is with London, Tube coffee aims to be the same in Cambodia, simply by being a Khmer brand created in Cambodia and made by Cambodians to compete with foreign brands. By using yellow, we hope to present to the world the warmth, freshness, happiness, optimism, and positivity of the Khmer culture. So, hop aboard and enjoy a smooth ride on the Khmer tube.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   016 55 05 64  recruitment@tubecafecambodia.com TUBE COFFEE OFFICE, St.317, Sangkat Boeng Kak I, Khan Tuol Kouk, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 016 55 05 64

Job Description:

-	Keep good collaboration with other department and teamwork.

-	Reviewing financial records, spreadsheets, and other documents to gain a thorough overview of company finances. 
-	Talking to staff members and assessing their tasks to identify areas where company operations can be made more efficient.

-	Ability to gather relevant information about internal company practice through research and discussions with employees 
-	Ability to write concise reports based on solid evidence 
-	Ability to communicate effectively across all employee levels.

Company Profile:
Pernod Ricard is the second-largest premium wines & spirits group, operating in over 86 affiliates and producing the widest international product portfolio in the industry with top brands such Absolut Vodka, Martell Cognac, Mumm Champagne, The Glenlivet, and Chivas Regal whisky among others. Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. imports and distributes products from the Group portfolio into the Cambodian market.
 
BACKGROUND
Pernod Ricard SA was created in 1975 through the link-up of the two largest French anise-based spirits companies: Pernod, which was founded in 1805, and Ricard, founded by Paul Ricard in 1932. Strategic M&A over the past three decades have vaulted Pernod Ricard into one of the top-tier international Wines & Spirits organizations in the world. In July 2017, Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. was launched locally, and marked the start of Pernod Ricard’s operations in Cambodia.

Job Description: The Song Saa Foundation is a not-for-profit Non-Governmental Organisation (NGO) based in the beautiful Koh Rong Archipelago, Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia. We are partnered with Song Saa Private Island (SSPI) and during the peak season Song Saa Foundation (SSF) is seeking an enthusiastic and articulate Sustainability Educator to support SSPI guest engagement and fundraising efforts of SSF alongside enhancing the resort’s local food sourcing strategy, particularly around a full-time fisher person and planned plant-based menu introduction. It will be a fun and rewarding role for someone with strong interpersonal skills, confidence, and a friendly attitude. If you have a passion for conservation and experience in hospitality, we would like to hear from you!              Primary roles• Daily coordination and delivery of tours with SSPI guests• Fundraising through SSPI guest donations• Communication of SSF work through diverse media channels• Staffing of the SSF Discovery Centre on SSPI and engaging with SSPI guests through the day• Enhancing sustainable food sourcing on SSPI• Understand and articulate the SSF projects, both community and marine, to engage guests in foundation work• Support SSF team by staffing the Discovery Centre, sometimes independently, showcasing current projects to resort guests and promoting guest participation in fundraising tours• Involving guests in SSF activities, such as leading tours, beach cleans, underwater clean-ups• Able to join SFF team in the field when required, both for community and marine projects Comfortable in the water and able to swim.• An understanding of science based social media communication to help promote the SSF online fundraising initiatives• Support the Community Coordinator to write and develop community education presentations• Support the SSF team collecting social data for the 10-year impact report Support the SSF team with drafting the annual report.• Work with the resort chef to produce a policy and communication brief for the resort’s sustainable food journey - highlight why the island employs its own fisher person, why we serve the fish we do (seasonality etc) and why certain fish are not available (food miles & carbon footprints, species of conservation concern)• Liaise with the Marine Scientist to research sustainable fishing methods within the KRA MNP and ensure the uptake of these by the SSPI fisherman role.• Support the Marine Scientist to develop a long term SSPI fishing monitoring plan
Job Requirement: • This position is open to both Khmer and international applicants with strong interpersonal skills• Fluent in English (qualification evidence for Khmer applicants would be ideal)• Proactive and confident – able to reach out and develop friendly relationships with guests• A willingness to learn new information and a dedication to exemplary customer service, with confidence and a friendly attitude• A passion for sustainability and Cambodian community development The ability to swim confidently is highly desired.
Company Profile:
Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078330733 talent@songsaa.com Koh Ouen, Khan Mittapheap, Preah Sihanouk 078330733

Company Profile:
Pernod Ricard is the second-largest premium wines & spirits group, operating in over 86 affiliates and producing the widest international product portfolio in the industry with top brands such Absolut Vodka, Martell Cognac, Mumm Champagne, The Glenlivet, and Chivas Regal whisky among others. Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. imports and distributes products from the Group portfolio into the Cambodian market.
 
BACKGROUND
Pernod Ricard SA was created in 1975 through the link-up of the two largest French anise-based spirits companies: Pernod, which was founded in 1805, and Ricard, founded by Paul Ricard in 1932. Strategic M&A over the past three decades have vaulted Pernod Ricard into one of the top-tier international Wines & Spirits organizations in the world. In July 2017, Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. was launched locally, and marked the start of Pernod Ricard’s operations in Cambodia.

Job Description:
Role Introduction

The Customer Care Advisor should maintain a high customer service standard when servicing and selling to customers.
Build strong relationship with customers and ensure the generation of maximum revenue through direct channels.
Interpret customer needs, promote Cathay services and brands via direct channels, identify sales opportunities and actively use the individual selling and customer service techniques to support, maximise and maintain revenue, whilst maintaining a focus on customer retention and service excellence.

Key Responsibilities

- Provide “one-stop-shop” customer service across Cathay from telephone, digital, and email channels
- Recommend travel products, fares and services and provide after-sales support to customers.
- Assist customers including direct corporate clients to reserve and make alteration of travel plans (ticket re-issuance)
- Provide customer service through telephone, digital, and email globally to all Cathay customers
- Assist customers to buy and self-serve seamlessly through our websites, cathaypacific.com and mobile application
- Assist customer to resolve disservice situations e.g. determine alternate flight options for delayed, cancelled or missed flights, change or rebook when irregularity occur
- Capture every sales opportunity to improve revenue generations
- Build, establish and maintain open lines of communication with agents, peers, executives, managers, business partners and other areas of the company to facilitate routine operation and problem solving.
- Identifying operational issues and suggest possible improvements
- Meet key contact centre performance goals in terms of customer satisfaction, quality, productivity and key performance metrics.
- Handle queue with all the related follow up with supervision
- Provide the B2B support and ensure that all queries are handled promptly and in a timely manner.
- Provide ticketing support to port airport team
- Handle locally on refund process and report to GGT or local FIN team for bank-in (CASH) payment received
- Support all sales & marketing related activities.
- Any other CCD related duties as assigned by direct appraiser
Job Requirement:
- 1 year of relevant experience
- Good command of written and spoken English and the core market language.
- Customer service-oriented attitude
- Great communication, listening and problem solving skills
- Ability to work as part of a team and independently
- Ability to work organized and focused
- Ability to work under pressure

Company Profile:
TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (previously called TOTAL Cambodge) is an affiliate of TotalEnergies, a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels, natural gas and green gases, renewables and electricity. Job Description:
•	Monthly plan order & stock Analysis, costing Analysis before processing order.
•	Responsible to manage purchasing function (materials sourcing, planning, purchasing, expediting, cost reduction, inventory control and supplier management) to meet company’s business goals and objectives to achieve optimal efficiency and effectiveness.

•	Collaborate with product and marketing team for product costing and getting information about product quality feedback.
•	To review of weekly & Analysis on product meeting report, weekly update cash flow report. 
•	Analyze selling price, gross profit, slow and fast moving products
•	Work actively with sales team to push slow moving product and nearly expired products
•	Lead on sourcing new products and determine market prices by collaborate with Purchase team on costing.
•	Develop and implement promotional activities such as promotion and product launches
•	Closely work with sales team on product quality complaints from customers.
•	Manage competitive intelligence and comparisons by working with cross-functional stakeholders and executing self-lead research to pass market price information to Purchase team to deal price with suppliers or/and to find suppliers for new products.
•	Any other duty assign by Operation Director.

•	Minimum Bachelor Degree qualification 
•	5-7 years in the relevant or similar industry and business acumen 
•	Experience managing marketing, cost analysis 
•	Proficient in Microsoft Office application.
•	Good in spoken and written English 
•	Collaboration work with teams of all levels
•	Strong analytical, planning and organizational skills.
•	Able to handle multiple demands, well organize, details oriented and meets deadlines.
•	Able to work independently and able to work fast pace and efficiently.
•	Ability to work autonomously and be part of the broader team
•	Positive attitude, hardworking, trustworthy and matured and able to maintain confidentiality at all times
•	Result-oriented & skilled in developing business plans while initiating the changes necessary to achieve strategic objectives in competitive global markets
•	Resourceful, result-oriented and work well under pressure 
•	Dynamic, hands-on and committed to work long hours to deliver results 
•	Have good business acumen with research, analytical skills and also customer oriented 
•	Good communication and interpersonal skills with ability to interact with people at all levels

•	Can be contactable after work hours and weekends

Company Profile: LOLC (CAMBODIA) PLC. is one of the top licensed microfinance institutions in Cambodia with a social vision and a business orientation that provides entrepreneurs and families at the base of the socio-economic pyramid with economic opportunities to transform the quality of their lives and their communities through the provision of effective and sustainable client-empowering financial services. Currently, LOLC serves more than 234,860 clients with loans outstanding of more than 603 million USD.

Job Description:
Operational:
 Software installation and Maintenance
 Data Extraction, Transformation, and Loading
 Specialized Data Handling
 Database Backup and Recovery
 Security & Log Review
 Authentication
 Capacity Planning
 Performance Monitoring
 Database Tuning
 Troubleshooting

Technical:
 Working with Database software (Oracle, SQL, PostgreSQL, etc.) to find ways to store, organize and manage data & troubleshooting.
 Keeping Databases up to date.
 Helping with database design and development.
 Designing maintenance procedures and applying them into operational
 Liaising with programmers, applications/operational staff, IT project managers and other technical staff.
 Managing database security/integrity and backup procedures.
 Defining objectives through consultation with staff at all levels.
 Writing reports, documentation, and operating manuals.
 Testing and modifying databases, application to ensure that they operate reliably.
 Providing user training, support, and feedback.
 Archiving data.
 Proper log review, reporting and recordation of resolutions (if any).
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or relevant certification.
 Proven working experience as a Database or Application support (minimum 2 years).
 Hands-on experience with database standards and end user applications.
 Excellent knowledge of data backup, recovery, security, integrity, and SQL.
 Familiarity with database design, documentation, and coding.
 Previous experience with DBA case tools (frontend/backend) and third-party tools.
 Experience on all or majority of below Oracle features is mandatory while Oracle DBA. related certification would be an added advantage.
- Oracle Database Enterprise Edition
- Diagnostic Packs
- Tuning Pack
- Real Application Clusters
- Audit Vault and Database Firewall
 Familiarity with programming languages API.
 Problem solving skills and ability to think algorithmically.
Company Profile: LOLC (CAMBODIA) PLC. is one of the top licensed microfinance institutions in Cambodia with a social vision and a business orientation that provides entrepreneurs and families at the base of the socio-economic pyramid with economic opportunities to transform the quality of their lives and their communities through the provision of effective and sustainable client-empowering financial services. Currently, LOLC serves more than 234,860 clients with loans outstanding of more than 603 million USD.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    TENDER COORDINATORREPORTS TO:   TENDER MANAGERLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Leading tender team in preparation of technical submissions for pre-tender     qualification and tender preparation.2.  Review tender documents and summarize critical information.3.  Prepare all documentation including method statements and other submissions.4.  Compile and prepare tender queries and response to tender queries.5.  Prepare and monitor tender progress.6.  Coordinate with tender team to obtain necessary information to facilitate     for tender submission7.  Coordinate meetings and prepare meeting minutes during tender stage.8.  Prepare and carry out tender presentation.9.  Monitor market for upcoming tenders and to obtain information.
Job Requirement: 1.  Bachelor’s degree engineering, business administration, finance or     construction management.2.  Minimum 3 years of experience in construction project bidding.3.  Confident individual with excellent interpersonal skills in leading a team.4.  Strong Communication with clients, suppliers and other team members.5.  Organize and track information about the project, such as the budget and     timeline.6.  Knowledge of project management and risk management.7.  Ability to communicate professionally with sub-contractors, customers.8.  Strong analytical, planning and organizing skills.9.  Problem-solving is the ability to identify a problem.
Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.
Contact Info: Contact Information KHIEV Ponleu HR Manager 017 809182, 016 22 58 83 hr@ychhe.com.kh Floor 15th T.K Central Tower, St 289, Phum 13, Sangkat Boeung Kak1, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 017 809182, 016 22 58 83

Job Description: JOB TITLE:	HOUSEKEEPING SUPERVISORREPORTS TO: 	OPERATIONS SUPERVISORLOCATION:	PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: 	NEGOTIABLE1. Assign the employees of housekeeping and laundry their duties and inspect    work for conformance to prescribed standards of cleanliness.2. Investigate complaints regarding housekeeping service and equipment and take    corrective action.3. Obtain list of room to be cleaned immediately and list of prospective check    out or discharge to prepare work assignments.4. Conduct orientation training and in-service training to explain policies,    work procedures and to demonstrate use and maintenance of equipment.5. Inventory stock to ensure adequate supplies.6. Perform cleaning duties in case of emergency or staff shortage.7. Establishes standards and procedures for work of housekeeping staff.8. Screens job applicants, hires new employees, and recommends promotions,    transfers, and dismissals.9. Assist the accountant to purchase cleaning and laundry supplies.10. Be on call 24hrs in case of emergency.
Job Requirement: 1.  High school diploma or equivalent.2.  5 years-experience in the housekeeping or related professional area3.  Basic Microsoft Word and Excel4.  Good English5.  Flexibility to work shifts including evenings, weekends and public holidays     subject to rota and a willingness to extend of change hours and days of work     from time to time upon request and subject to operational requirement.

Job Description:
- Preparation of daily call objectives and questionnaires, conduct telephone interviews with customers.
- Conduct and engage in quantitative research in the market that involves large number of customers.
- Present results/ findings to Analysis Supervisors that highlight commonalities, trends, and responses.
- Collate feedback from customers on the performance of the sales personnel and company products.
- Collect market information on competitors’ movement and sales performances in the market.
- Handle customer complaints and answer customer queries/ doubts, provide customers with needed information.
- Maintain phone etiquette to establish solid and long-term influential relationships.
- Schedule appointments for relevant sales personnel and distributors to meet with prospective customers.
- Facilitate sales between customers and distributors through calls so as to ensure service levels are met.
- Deliver sales pitch and scripts, present company’s products to potential customers.
Job Requirement:
- High School Diploma/ Degree in Business Studies or Related Field.
- At least 1 – 3 years in customer service or proven experience as a telemarketer.
- Proven track record of meeting sales quota over cold calling is a plus.
- Good command of English, written and spoken; and computer literate.
- Highly numerate with logical thinking skill, result oriented and is hands on.
- Excellent communicator who can handle difficult business situations well.
- Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills to identify core issues.
- Ability to demonstrate energy, sense of urgency, focus and follow through.
- Excellent negotiation and communication skills, including listening and questioning.
- Be able to travel to province

Job Description:
- Perform daily outlet visits in allocated areas
- Conduct and execute sales and marketing activities to meet company objective
- Ensuring product representation is visible and well stocked in outlets at all times
- Work closely with distributor team to achieve sales target set
- Collect market intelligence on the needs of customers
- Keep supervisor informed of sales activities and channel performance by submitting
- timely and accurate activity reports
- Develop solid and long-term influential relationships with distributors and all outlets in assigned territory
- Perform related duties as assigned from time to time as required by the company
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Business Administration/Marketing, Commerce or Management
- At least 2 years of outdoor sales experience preferably from FMCG/Beverage/Brewery
- Excellent communicator and good interpersonal skill, able to handle difficult business situations and able to persuade and negotiate well
- Knowledge of advertising and sales promotion techniques
- Ability to demonstrate energy, sense of urgency, focus and follow through that deliver high quality results
- Required to maintain a professional appearance and provide a positive company image to the public
- Honest and with integrity
- Good command of English, written and spoken; arithmetic skill required and computer literate
- Require the possession of a valid state driving license and be able to drive a vehicle with willingness to work a flexible schedule with night market visits

Job Description: [Responsibilities]•	Make financial reports and make reports for financial analysis.•	Make reports for monthly sales, monthly expenses, royalty, cash and bank balance, cash flow for the forecast.•	Checking documents made by financial staff such as advance payment, deposits, journals, depreciation, petty cash, cash in banks, for suppliers, invoices, official receipts, internal documents...•	Checking documents made by other departments such as purchase requisition, work requisition, purchase order, fixed assets requisition, fixed assets control sheet, payroll...•	Verify invoices from suppliers.•	Managing and overseeing the daily operations of the accounting department•	Perform costing calculation for all kind of products•	Establishing and enforcing proper accounting methods, policies, and principles•	Monitoring and analyzing accounting data and produce financial reports or statements•	Review and close monthly financial report•	Daily Cash/Bank management and reconciliation•	Daily control of payment and purchasing work•	Monthly and annual tax declaration•	Perform Daily/monthly/yearly key reconciliation in proper technical manner•	Daily problem solving and coordinating internal and external stakeholder•	Other work required by superiors[Working Day/Hour]•	Working Day	: Monday to Saturday (6 days/week)•	Working Hour	: 7:30am to 4:30pm (8 hours/day, 1hour lunch break)[Allowances & Benefits]•	Yes
Job Requirement: •	Males or Female, Age over 30•	Bachelor's degree of accounting or finance, pursing CPA is preferable.•	At least 5 years in financial, Accounting, Tax, or management experience.•	Good comment of English•	Proficient in using financial software, Microsoft office and QuickBooks•	Knowledge of Cambodia accounting standards (CIFRS for SMEs)•	Knowledge of Cambodia tax law•	Friendly, politely, and honesty•	Positive attitude and willing to challenge the new thing.•	Teamwork, adaptability, initiative, analytical, hard-working, ability to work fast and accurately•	Good at communicate and problems solving•	Work on time, accurate and flexible

Job Description:
	Draft, review, and translate MOUs, contracts/agreements (lending, sale-purchase, lease, marketing, constructions etc.), NDAs, legal/official documents.
	Collect, research and consolidate laws, regulations, and legal articles for reporting, advising (legal opinion) and filing.
	Update and advise the management and relevant departments on any change in laws and regulations.
	Orientation and refresher Training on AML/CFT.
	Monitor compliance checklist to ensure the performance/ operations are in compliance with laws, regulations and requirements from authorities/lenders.
	Review LOLC’s loan agreements with lenders and other MOUs to ensure terms and conditions are valid and comply with relevant laws and regulations.
	Update management and relevant department on any changes of laws and regulations related to MDI business such as NBC regulations, land law, contract law, international business law, labor law, etc.  
	Facilitate legal actions with lawyer on any court case procedures. 
	Review existing and new legal related documents and contracts such as loan agreement with clients and employment contract to ensure they are valid and legal binding and recommend corrective actions when needed.
	Take lead in processing for licenses, patent tax and other letters with government authorities when required.
	Performance other tasks as assigned by a manager.
Job Requirement:
	Bachelor’s Degree in law, or related field.
	Minimum 3 year-experiences related to Legal with financial institution.
	Good analytical and skepticism skills.
	Good written and verbal communication in English.

               Women are Encouraged to Apply!

Job Description:
•	Controlling budgets for security operations and monitor expenses
•	Ensure that all security operations are conducted in a legally compliant, professional, ethical, and profitable manner in accordance with company policies and procedures.
•	Analyse and evaluate security operations to identify risks or opportunities for improvement.
•	Create or implement security standards, policies, and procedures
•	Developing work schedules, allocating tasks, and monitoring personnel performance.
•	Provide virtual or on-site guidance to security guard (Armed and Unarmed) as required
•	Review written reports and activity summaries of security for completeness and accuracy.
•	Meets as needed with stack holders to proactively address security, emergency, and safety matters.
•	Responsible for orientation and training of Security guard and other personnel.
•	Plays a central role in ensuring a safe, healthy, and secure workplace.
•	Serves as the key point of contact to ensure the delivery of high-quality security services; initiates any necessary corrective actions in a timely manner
•	Determine risks and develop mitigation strategies
•	Manage the security systems, including card access system, CCTV, fire alarms, etc.
•	Prepare reports or make presentations on internal investigations, losses, or violations of regulations, policies, and procedures.
•	Conducts regular security inspection

•	Willing to continue building skills through training opportunities

•	Remains calm in fast-paced and stressful situations.
•	Demonstrates attention to detail and is diligent.
•	Works well independently and has strong project management skills.
•	Communicates well and has excellent written and verbal communication skills
•	Availability to respond to security alerts outside of business hours
•	Master/Bachelor’s Degree or minimum of three (4) years’ supervisory experience/expertise in law enforcement, public safety, or security in lieu of a degree
•	Good communication skills in English (Spoken & Written)

Job Description:
• 	Operate the day-to-day sales operations with excellent customer services to achieve sales target
•	Present available housing units including project’s special features to clients and close deal with clients
•	Provide consultation and solutions to clients to influence client’s decision for the project benefit
•	Prepare and process sales documentation including document collection, Sales and Purchase Agreements (SPAs) arrangement, clients’ request, etc following company sales SOP
•	Maintain relationship with existing and prospective clients
•	Make sales reports for sales supervisor/manager
•	Promote the project through different channels to generate new sales 
•	Assist in resolving customer complaints and concerns
•	Maintain all communication with clients, sales documents and templates, including price list, payment plans and other sales related documents;
•	Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
•	A degree in Sales/Marketing or business management or other relevant fields
•	1-2 years of experience in sales, customer service or hospitality (preferably in real estate sector)
•	Be able to deal with different types of customer
•	Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, and problem solving skills
•	Be result-oriented and strongly committed for achieving sales targets 
•	Be able to work as a team and work under pressure 
•	Be willing to take new challenges and learn new things
•	Be able to work overtime and weekends/public holidays on a rotating shift basis
•	Computer literacy in MS. Office 
•	Good in speaking and writing both English and Khmer
•	Strong with client relationships.
•	Good at Negotiation skill
•	Be able to meet the Sales Target
•	Creativity, Sales Planning

4. Working Days and Hours:
– Monday to Sunday: 8:00am to 5:00pm
– Lunch time: 12:00am to 1:00pm (rotating)
– 1day off per week on rotating basis

5. Workplace
This position is based at Sales office at the Project site on NR21, Koh Kor village, Sangkat Roka Khpus, Krong Takhmao, Kandal province.

6. Salary: Negotiable based on experiences

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Develop, update and initiate procurement policy, procedures, guidelines, rules and regulations in order to implementing the professional procurement efficiency and transparent practices.
• Develop and execute a long-term strategy to facilitate improvements for Procurement Services.
• Lead procurement members for price negotiation with the request of credit term to suppliers who used to deal more often and lead to yearly contract if necessary, for common use.
• Solve general related-issues, if any, and advise/coach not only to procurement members but also others for the good practice, correction, prevention in next future with cost saving purpose (art of sharing for development and improvement for team and company).
• Designing strategies to response to the company’s strategic plan and budgeting.
• Review, reject, approve of PR, PO, Invoice, Advance payment and Request for payment.
• Review supplier evaluation form and issue purchase order.
• Amend the existing vender list to detail and sort for good supplier selection.
• Plan the budget for the whole year, develop the demand and supply for all campuses of Aii and AIS usages and conduct yearly contract with vender for large amount orders to obtain the low price.
• Update and improve the existing form to make sure that all necessary information is inputted to P.O, Supplier Evaluation Form, PO and Invoice of vender as well as develop new forms related with current practice of procurement department for internal and external usage.
• Re-arrange the workflow of warehouse to prevent being out of stock.
• Seek new and good suppliers to continue the business with cost saving purpose.
• Closely work with Finance Department for new system to implement (Sun System) and requesters.
• Supervise, manage, and lead the operation of procurement as professional input method.
• Regularly check various vendors/suppliers to obtain quotations of goods for best values with good quality.
• Frequently deal with suppliers to do price negotiation and discount.
• Regularly seek for new appropriate suppliers and update to suppliers list.
• Networking with wholesales and reputed suppliers to company.
• Review all expense reports of subordinates.
• Other tasks assigned by line manager and top management.
Job Requirement: • Master/bachelor’s degrees in Business Administration or any other relevant fields.• At least 5+ or more years of work experiences in Procurement.• Strong leadership capabilities.• Computer literacy especially MS Office.• Familiarity with sourcing and vendor management.• Solid judgement along with decision making skills.• Good oral and written both English and Khmer.• Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure and workload.• Ability to persuade vendor for creditable and cheque payment.• Must be high responsible for deadline requisition bases.• Good at negotiation, communication, interpersonal skills and problem-solving skills• Experience working with construction companies is an advantage.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh. 012 797 939

Job Description: DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESProject Management• Monitor the progress of construction work relative to scope, quality, budget, schedule, risks and resources. • Carries out project risk assessment and propose solutions. • Engages with Clients & Owners to identify needs and goals for each project.• Manage teams for deal advisory, due diligence, construction monitoring and consulting projects with full responsibility for the financial performance of the engagements.• Handle cost control related tasks, i.e. IPC clearance, cash flow monitoring, and VO assessment.• Handle time control related tasks, i.e. work program review, project progress monitoring, deadline monitoring, notification of delays, critical path assessment, submission schedule tracking, and all time related co-ordinations.• Weekly and monthly report submission to Management.• Manage client relationship with all related parties, and develop and maintain strong internal and external networks.• Take lead and report to Owner and Top Management for project planning, managing and controlling the execution of multi-disciplinary projects from inception to handover with high quality, within schedule and budget.• Liaise with clients, government authorities and project stakeholders. • Review the project in-depth to schedule deliverables and estimate costs. • Lead tender exercise and facilitate project award process. • Manage design consultants and contractors for project success. • Supervise operational budget and determine needed resources (manpower, equipment and materials) from start to finish with attention to budgetary limitations and efficiency.• Be the main driver to ensure timely project completion. • Supervise Project Management team.• Ensure compliance of Project Quality Plan.• Management of Contractual Matters.• Provide in-house QS Services as needed. • Inspect any changes to project plan and report change impact and/or resolution.• Lead reports writing.• Other related tasks that are assigned by higher management from time to time.Construction Technical Management• Lead person-in-charge for all technical related matters.• Serve as the technical expert for detailed design and construction aspects of the project. • Answer questions and resolve issues brought forth by the internal team members, client, consulting engineers and contractors.• Deliver high level in architecture design, managing project expectations and timetables    • Throughout all phases of development process.• Perform expediting actions in sourcing technical information, submission of data/method statement for installation, delivery and transport of materials/equipment, storage and issuance for site installation works.• Prepare detailed installation plans, methodology, processes and procedures for support of construction team.• Propose and oversee timelines for engineering proposals and submissions are met.• Check and confirm the accuracy of submissions from contractors, vendors and suppliers for the work to be performed, coordinate and ensure approvals are received from client in timely manner.• Set up procedure and processes in monitoring and tracking of engineering related documentation throughout project lifestyle.• Prepare and deliver various installation/erection or construction related presentations, both internally and externally.• Play a key role in the overall success of our organization by planning, managing, and monitoring of the engineering functions.• Working with customers to develop contracts & execute projects that meet commercial and engineering objectives.• Oversee and direct projects from construction initiation to completion.• Ensure that all project tasks are delivered with desired quality, and as per required scope. • Ensure resource availability and allocation.• Supervise and delegate project tasks to key responsible staff both on-site and off-site.
Job Requirement: - Minimum of a bachelor’s degree in engineering (Mechanical, Electrical, Civil & Structural, Environmental or Process Control & Automation), Master’s degree in engineering management will be plus.- Minimum 10 years of engineering experience, ideally as a managerial / expediting role in process, energy, water or chemical plants construction or large-scale infrastructure design and construction projects locally- Analytical and mathematical mind, capable of evaluating and solving various complex problems.- Strong leadership and management skills. - Organizational competencies and project management skills to keep project, processes, and the entire engineering tasks on track.- Self-motivated attitude with the ability to multitask and thrive in a timeline-driven environment.- Interpersonal communication skills with expertise in distilling complicated topics to a broader audience.- Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.- Able to work in construction project site.

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description: ក្រុមហ៊ុន រស្មីសួគ៌ ហ្វាម៉ា ជាក្រុមហ៊ុន នាំចូល និងចែកចាយឱសថ និង បរិក្ខាពេទ្យស្របច្បាប់នៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។
Job Requirement:
- អ្នកបើកឡាន (​បើកឡាន 12 កៅអី )​
- មានបទពិសោធន៏ ១​ ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
- មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ
- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ​20-35 ឆ្នាំ
- អាចបើកឡានទៅខេត្ត និងភ្នំពេញបាន
- មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកថែទាំរថយន្ត និងម៉ូ​តូ (​មើលប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន និងទឹករថយន្ត)

- បើបេក្ខជនមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៏ទំនាក់ទំនងដាក់ពាក្យតាមរយះលេខទូរស័ព្ទ Tel : 016 599 496 និង​ telegram: 012 599 496 រឺ ផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបមក Email : hor-chhun@hotmail.com
- អាស័យដ្ឋាន ផ្ទះលេខ ២៦៧​ ផ្លូវ​ ណ័រប្រីត (​ផ្លូវទស្សន៏អាស៊ីអាគ្នេយ៏)​ សង្កាត់ទឺកថ្លា​ ខណ្ឌសែនសុខរាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
Company Profile: ក្រុមហ៊ុន រស្មីសួគ៌ ហ្វាម៉ា ជាក្រុមហ៊ុន នាំចូល និងចែកចាយឱសថ និង បរិក្ខាពេទ្យស្របច្បាប់នៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។

job title: ផ្នែកលក់ ឱសថ​ 5 នាក់បន្ថែម
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន រស្មីសួគ៌ ហ្វាម៉ា ( ផ្នែកលក់ឱសថ)
position: ផ្នែកលក់ ឱសថ​ 5 នាក់បន្ថែម
Job Description: ក្រុមហ៊ុន រស្មីសួគ៌ ហ្វាម៉ា ជាក្រុមហ៊ុន នាំចូល និងចែកចាយឱសថ និង បរិក្ខាពេទ្យស្របច្បាប់នៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។
Job Requirement:
**​ ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ផ្នែកលក់ ភេទប្រុស 8 នាក់ 
- កម្រិតវប្បធម៏សញ្ញាបត្របាក់ឌុបឡើងទៅ
- សុភាព ទៀងត្រង់ ចេះទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន
- មានបទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកលក់ថ្នាំពេទ្យកាន់តែប្រសើរ
- ប្រាក់បៀវត្សអាស្រ័យបទពិសោធន៍
- មានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន
- អាចចុះខេត្ត និងនៅភ្នំពេញបាន

- បើបេក្ខជនមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៏សូមផ្ញើរ ប្រវត្តិរូបមកអាស័យដ្ឋាន ផ្ទះលេខ ២៦៧​ ផ្លូវ​ ណ័រប្រីត (​ផ្លូវទស្សន៏អាស៊ីអាគ្នេយ៏)​ សង្កាត់ទឺកថ្លា​ ខណ្ឌសែនសុខរាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
- Phone and Telegram : 012 599 496 
- Email : hor-chhun@hotmail.com

job title: Manager of Mobile Banking- Business (Chinese Speaking)
position: Manager of Mobile Banking- Business (Chinese Speaking)
Company Profile: Panda Commercial Bank is an innovative financial enterprise aiming to bring leading financial technology services to the world. The team of Panda Bank is composed of top bankers, security experts and software and hardware technology elites. By analyzing the path from the first coin to the Internet Financial Group, it provides a forward-looking basic service platform and widely accepted ideal financial lifestyle. We are committed to providing high-quality financial services that are easy to operate, safe and reliable, convenient and efficient, to benefit sharing to customers around the world through technological innovation capabilities, and become the world's leading digital bank.Panda Commercial Bank是一家旨在为世界带来领先金融科技服务的创新金融企业，公司团队由顶尖的银行家、安全领域专家和软硬件科技精英组成，通过分析从第一枚硬币到互联网金融的路径，提供前瞻性的基础服务平台和广泛接受的理想金融生活方式。Panda Bank致力于通过科技创新能力，向全球客户提供操作简单、安全可靠、方便快捷、利益共享的优质金融服务，成为全球领先的数字银行。
Contact Info: Contact Information Pon HR Manager 0182828481 hr@pandabank.com.kh Panda Commercial Bank Building, Street Samdach Penn (289), Sangkat Boeung Kok1, Khan Toulkork,  Phnom Penh. 0182828481

Job Description: •	Sell products throughout pharmacies, clinics, hospitals, and other customers.•	Meet Doctors, Pharmacist, and other healthcare workers in order to detail the company products.•	Build good relationship with customers.•	Plan and implement with Doctors and Pharmacy meetings for the promotion of the products.•	Create demand for the products at hospitals, clinics, pharmacy and other health care outlet.•	Joint and perform all other marketing activities.•	Regular feedback on the promotional strategies of the company.•	Prepare and submit sales receipt and other supporting document.•	Maintain daily record of the promotional materials issued by the company.•	Maintain daily report, tour plan, and Dr’s dairy.•	Maintain all other Kits, including uniform, working bag, literature etc. •	Prepare report to Sales Supervisor.  •	Other task assigned by Sales Supervisor and Business Manager.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor Degree in Science/Pharma •	1-2 years work experience as Medical Representative from food products. •	Good command of written and spoken English.•	Proficiency in MS Office.•       Location : Icon Building, Chamkar Morn, Phnom Penh •       Salary Rank : $350-$450•       Working Days : Mon - Sat•       Working Hour : 8am-5pm•       Industry : Medical Supplies
Contact Info: Contact Information Belly (Mr.)  HR Manager 069222004 hrecruitment88@gmail.com Phnom Penh 1st Floor of Altos Hotel, St.148 Corner St.19, Sangkat Phsar Kandal II, Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 069222004

Job Description:
- To proactively identify new inquiry and maintain full information of opportunity
- To identify the needs of customers and providing a sufficient resolution in order to fulfill customer expectation
- To conduct frequent communication with customer by phone call, mail, written letter and visiting to customer premises and build strong relationship
- To ensure minimum company Sales Target with high commitment
- To update your customer profile (customer-by-customer)
- To ensure display in showroom are clean and creating new idea of showroom decoration when no showroom standby duty
- To ensure timely and accurate daily report to superior
- To collect, analyze and evaluate competitor and a market in order to create sales strategy
- To make After Sales Service reminder by phone call and ensure customers understand the benefit of Service Maintenance and come for service base on schedule
- To support peer colleague as and when necessary
- To conduct other jobs as assigned by supervisors or manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree of Management/Business of administration or related field
- Excellent Communication
- Outstanding fresh graduated student
- Good English and Chinese communication
- Team player, initiative , friendly, fresh and service oriented
- Good command of both spoken and written English & Chinese
- Knowledge of computer word, excel and power point
Company Profile: Toyota (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. is a sole exclusive distributor for all TOYOTA vehicles, Genuine Parts and Quality Service in the Kingdom of Cambodia. With the endless and massive support from our manufacturer, we have always taken into consideration regarding the right selection of suitable products into Cambodian market. To make the best choice, the critical survey on market condition such as road condition, fuel quality, driving behavior, weather and so forth is thoroughly conducted and analyzed for the aim of ensuring the conformity of our products. As a result, many different varieties of TOYOTA models have been introduced to satisfy our customer's needs and wants.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  086333198 recruitment@toyota.com.kh Russian Federation Blvd, Phum Borey 100 Khnong,Sangkat Teuk Thla , Khan Sen Sok, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. 086333198

Job Description:
-In charge of Collection (Cash, Cheque, POS, and Bank -Transfer), petty cash, change fund, and cash deposit with agency
-In charge of collecting all Sale Invoice, Internal Sale then cross check with accounting system to ensure correct amount and number of transactions
-Monitor & check advance receive vehicle, service coupon, and advance receive parts
-Allocate trade debtor, cash and/or cheque deposit (vehicle, service coupon, parts order), customer deposit for other income, and vehicle inventory
-Close daily collection report, prepare all cash, cheque, and other supporting documents to head of branch for review
-Prepare petty cash and wing payment to supplier and/or staff and posting to accounting system
-Reimburse of petty cash and wing account for plate number register
-Ensure keeping cash and cheque in a safe box and within the sum insure amount
-Prepare monthly sales report (new car, accessary, and service) to head of branch for review
-Ensure accounting documents are kept properly, following 4s kaizen principle
-Ensure carry out the tasks smoothly and in compliance with the company procedure (e.g. Payment procedure) and/or policy
-Perform other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
-Bachelor Degree in Accounting or related fields
-At least 1 year of professional experience
-Good knowledge of computer i.e. Ms. Word and Excel
-Good understanding of Accounting Software
-Good personality and self-motivation
-Honest, patient, and able to work with less supervision
-Good command in English both writing and speaking
-Ability to work under a shift of schedule
Company Profile: Toyota (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. is a sole exclusive distributor for all TOYOTA vehicles, Genuine Parts and Quality Service in the Kingdom of Cambodia. With the endless and massive support from our manufacturer, we have always taken into consideration regarding the right selection of suitable products into Cambodian market. To make the best choice, the critical survey on market condition such as road condition, fuel quality, driving behavior, weather and so forth is thoroughly conducted and analyzed for the aim of ensuring the conformity of our products. As a result, many different varieties of TOYOTA models have been introduced to satisfy our customer's needs and wants.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  086333198 recruitment@toyota.com.kh Phnom Penh Toyota Cambodia - Head Officer 086333198

position: Showroom Sales Consultant អ្នកលក់ក្នុងហាង ($300 - $ 500)
Job Description: ស៊ីញ ហាក់ ហ៊ួត ជាមជ្ឈមណ្ឌលកែលំអរគេហដ្ឋានឈានមុខគេមួយនៅក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជា។អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបាន៖​- ប្រាក់ខែ	 : 300$ - 500$ - ឯកសណ្ឋាន-​ ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ (១៨ថ្ងៃ/ឆ្នាំ)- ដំណើរកំសាន្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-​ ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិ-​ កម្រៃជើងសារ- ប្រាក់កម្រៃបន្ថែមI. តួនាទី និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវសំខាន់ៗ៖•	ទទួលនិងស្វាគមន៍អតិថិជន ជូនអតិថិជនទស្សនាពីផលិតផល និងប្រឹក្សាលក់•	ស្វែងយល់ពីតម្រូវការអតិថិជន•	បង្កើតគណនីជូនអតិថិជនថ្មី•	បង្កើត quote សម្រាប់អតិថិជននៅពេលមានតម្រូវការ•	ផ្តល់ជា កាតាឡុក ជូនអតិថិជន•	បង្កើត PO និងបញ្ជូនទៅផ្នែកឃ្លាំង នៅពេលអតិថិជនធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញ•	ធ្វើការសម្របសម្រួលជាមួយផ្នែកឃ្លាំងក្នុងការដឹកជញ្ជូនទំនិញជូនអតិថិជន •	ចេញវិក្កយបត្រជូនអតិថិជន និងទទួលការទូទាត់ពីអតិថិជន •	ធ្វើការបិតតម្លៃនិងលេខកូដទំនិញអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវនិងច្បាស់លាស់•	ធ្វើការខលឬទំនាក់ទំនងទៅភ្ញៀវដើម្បីជូនដណឹងពីប្រូម៉ូសិន និងសាកសួរពីតម្រូវការ•	ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ លក់ ចំនួនខល ចំនួនជួបភ្ញៀវ ចំនួនភ្ញៀវមកទស្សនា ។ល។•	ការងារផ្សេងទៀតដែលដាក់ចេញដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។
Job Requirement: II. តម្រូវការការងារ •	បានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រឡើងទៅ •	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ១ឆ្នាំក្នុងផ្នែកលក់ នៃវិស័យដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ•	មានអាកប្បកិរិយាល្អសមស្របជាអ្នកលក់មានជំនាញ•	ចេះវិភាគពីតម្រូវការរបស់អតិថិជន និងចេះធ្វើបទបង្ហាញ •	ពូកែទំនាក់ទំនង ចេះបត់បែន និងភាពស្មោះត្រង់•	មានការតស៊ូ និងប្តេជ្ញា មុះមុតសម្រេចតាមផែនការ•	មានឆន្ទះក្នុងការរៀននូវអ្វីដែលថ្មីៗ និងចង់អភិវឌ្ឍន៍។អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:•	ធ្វើការ ៦ថ្ងៃ ក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៍•	ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិធំៗ (បុណ្យតូចៗឆ្លាសវេនឈប់សម្រាក)•	ទទួលបានប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តពីការលក់ (Sale Incentive) ប្រសិនបើលក់គ្រប់ ឬលើលផែនការ•	ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលបន្ថែម•	កម្មវិធីជួបលៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ•	មានការតម្លើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំHOW TO APPLY:Interested candidates are invited to submit CV and Cover Letter toAddress:#353ABC, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Sangkat Phsar Depo1, Khan Toul Kork, Capital of Phnom Penh.CONTACT: Recruitment TeamTel/Telegram : 096 599 6996E-mail : recruitment@sinhhakhouts.com ព័ត៌មានលម្អិត ៖Telegram:   SHH Career Page
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

Are you a dynamic professional with a passion for success who is looking for an opportunity that will take your career to a whole new level? If yes, we wish to invite you to apply for the follow positions:
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   096 599 6996 recruitment@sinhhakhouts.com #353 ABC, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Sangkat Phsar Depo1, Khan Toul Kork, Capital of Phnom Penh 096 599 6996

Job Description:
- Build and execute social media strategy through competitive research, platform determination, benchmarking, messaging and audience identification
- Generate, edit, publish and share daily content (original text, images, video or HTML) that builds meaningful connections and encourages community members to take action
- Set up and optimize company pages within each platform to increase the visibility of company’s social content
- Moderate all user-generated content in line with the moderation policy for each community
- Create editorial calendars and syndication schedules
- Continuously improve by capturing and analyzing the appropriate social data/metrics, insights and best practices, and then acting on the information
- Collaborate with other departments (customer relations, sales etc) to manage reputation, identify key players and coordinate actions
Job Requirement:
- Proven working experience in social media marketing or as a Digital Media Specialist
- Excellent consulting, writing, editing (photo/video/text), presentation and communication skills
- Demonstrable social networking experience and social analytics tools knowledge
- Adequate knowledge of web design, web development, CRO and SEO
- Knowledge of online marketing and good understanding of major marketing channels
- Positive attitude, detail and customer oriented  with good multitasking and organizational ability
- Fluency in English
BS in Communications, Marketing, Business, New Media or Public Relations

Job Description:
Key performance: 
- Lead Generation for each product/services
- Growth in overall product/services revenue
- Increase awareness & educate customers on MekongNet product & service offerings

• Responsible for all marketing programs supporting all MekongNet Services/Products (Local & International Connectivity, Data Centre & Hosting, SMS, Solutions and Products).
• As part of the Marketing team, you will work closely with various internal stakeholders including Sales, Solutions and Finance to develop and execute campaigns in accordance with company's strategic goals.
• Identify key target segments and develop lead generation programs to reach out and engage with appropriate products, services or solutions through the most appropriate communication channel or media.
• Develop and track marketing launch plans for both new and existing products/solutions, ensuring that each plan yields the desired ROI and achieve growth for Corporate Business.
• Work closely with Solutions Team to develop sales enablement materials, content or tools to ensure internal stakeholders are educated and trained on new product / solutions launches.
• Develop quality content and content calendar to engage key target audiences and stakeholders.
• Establish and own relationships with key product / solution partners for joint Go-To-Market programs.
• Conduct regular market industry research and analysis to ensure MekongNet product and services offerings are competitive in the market.
Job Requirement:
1. Education & Certification:
   • Bachelor Degree of Marketing, Business, or related field.

2. Experiences & Skills:
   • 3-5 years of experience in telecommunication field
   •Proven track record in executing product launches and lead generation programs
   • Good communications and able to drive marketing programmes independently and work well as a team player 
   • Experienced in driving both online and offline marketing campaigns, and events
   • Strong analytical skills and strong knowledge of market segmentation and market trends
   • Well-presented and attractive personality
   • Be open for travelling and field works
   • Good written and spoken English, Khmer or other languages: Chinese/Vietnamese/Thai is preferable

3. Attitude:
   • Focus and goal-orientated
   • Team player
   • Patient and can work under pressure

•	Provide IT support to customer, mainly related to internet service

•	Install, configure, and maintain internet connection, network cabling, and other related equipment, and devices, adds or upgrades hardware and software and configures wireless access point, router with wireless and related equipment

Job Description:
• Define and recommend strategic for the service and the product to enhance the market growth and revenue
• Assist in the development of the annual sales and marketing plan
• Communicate the value proposition of Face line services and products to the sales team and develop the sales tools that support the selling process of your products 
• Maintaining and developing relationships with existing customers in person and via telephone calls and emails;
• Maintain records of customers who do not make a purchase and follow up as needed.
• Cold calling to arrange meetings with potential customers to prospect for new business;
• Gathering market and customer information and to understand competitor’s price and products.
• Making accurate, rapid cost calculations and providing customers with quotations;
• Coordinates proper property resources to ensure efficient and stable sales results 
• Sales & Marketing database – updating where necessary to allow effective promotions
• Prepare and design the specification for new service and products
• Conduct Research and provide support to supervisor to identify the market needs
• Survey regularly on competitors’ activities and collect all necessary information and materials
• Prepare daily, weekly and monthly research and products report
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s in Sale/Marketing or Business administrative or related field… 
• At least 3-5 years of product marketing or Sales 
• Similar previous background for the beauty salon serviced clinic 
• Good communications, and flexible 
• Good understanding of the service products of beauty salon
• Good written and spoken English or other languages would be more advantage. 
• Computer literacy (Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint/Internet-email)
• Knowledge in beauty salon is advantage

Location: This position is based in Phnom Penh 
Duration: Full-time work
Working Hours: 08:00am to 06:00pm (Day off 1 day a week)
Range Salary: Based on Experiences

Job Description:
* Unit & Location:

•	Auskhmer Office in Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
•	The employee however, may be required to work to other branches upon the need.

* Reporting & Working Relationships:

•	Reporting to CEO
•	Working closely with Marketing team, sales team and other relevant staff 
Position Objectives:	
•	The marketing manager manages the day to day marketing activities of the organization and long term marketing strategy for the company.

* Responsibilities

•	Development and implementation of the brand strategy, marking strategy for new and existing products, including campaigns, events, digital marketing and PR
•	Working closely with the sales team, enabling them to meet  their commercial objectives by providing them with appropriate tools, materials and presentations
•	Guiding the day to day activities of the marketing team 
•	Ensuring that the marketing objectives are implement by the marketing team
•	Work closely with product management team to define marketing materials and program.
•	Manage Social media presence and direct programs to improve social media reputation and recognition 
•	developing and delivering marketing and communication strategies for the organization 
•	Undertake continuous analysis of competitive environment and consumer trends.
•	Develops and implements strategic PR programs to achieve significant increases in brand awareness
•	Coordinate all public relations activities and analyzing media coverage
•	Manage media inquiries and interview requests, speaking publicly, press conferences and presentations by creating content and articles 
•	Build relationships with thought leaders to grow industry awareness
•	Maintain a keen understanding of industry trends affecting clients and make appropriate recommendations regarding communication strategy surrounding them
•	Identify main client groups and audiences and determine the best way to reach them
•	Organizing promotional events such as press conferences, open days, exhibitions, tours and visits.
•	Manage special events such as sponsorship of races, parties introducing new products, or other activities the firm supports in order to gain public attention through the media without advertising directly.
•	Draft speeches for company executives, and arrange interviews and other forms of contact for them.
•	Establish and maintain effective working relationships with local and municipal government officials and media representatives
•	Other tasks assigned by management 

* People Management

•	Own recruiting, objectives setting, coaching and performance monitoring of Marketing team.
•	Response for account abilities of team management.
•	Lead, motivate, communicate with, develop, appraise and performance manage staff to ensure they are fully motivated to achieve best.
•	Take responsibilities for the training and development of all colleagues within your team.
•	Address any issues of poor performance, taking disciplinary action as deemed necessary
•	Communicate all relevant information and ensure all down line team in your department are aware on department objectives and how individual roles responsibilities.
•	Ensure all team comply with company policies and procedures

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
Role Introduction

To assist with operational and reservation functions for the port including oversight of suppliers to ensure compliance to Cathay service levels and regulatory requirements.

To ensure the highest standards of safety during ground handling of the aircraft and to achieve on-time-performance.

To provide support to port management to drive service excellence and delivery of the cargo services strategy.

Key Responsibilities

Customer Service

- Support cargo reservations and bookings whilst providing exemplary customer service
- Provide timely vendor notification for on time and delayed flights
- Provide timely shipment status updates to customers
- Help to manage Ground Handling Agent performance and provide guidelines and instructions
- Support the established performance targets through operational oversight and participation

Administrative Support: 
- Prepare flight documentation for crew and Customs
- Check and review post flight documentation
- Prepare post flight reports in a timely and accurate manner
- Provide freighter catering uplift and last minute changes
- Coordinate effectively between engineering, airport operations, air traffic control and vendors to ensure smooth communication and service provision
- Coordinate cargo service activities between sales, operations and ground handling in order to ensure efficient handling of shipments
- Communicate effectively via various channels stakeholders including customers, airport and cargo operations, suppliers, flight crew etc.
- Assist with various administrative station tasks such as SAP
- Coordinate weather diversions at diversion sites
- Handle diversion of Cathay Pacific Flights when required
- Assist with crew administration and support matters at the port
- Support station training activities as required
- Support station management in supplier oversight including reporting Ground Handling Agent performance issues
- Any other reasonable task as requested

Ramp Coordinator:  
- Monitor and ensure the required procedures are properly carried out by Ramp Handling Operator and the Cargo Terminal - Operator particularly for special cargo, movement of in/out cargo and mail units on an ad-hoc basis, loading and unloading of freighter, etc.
- Monitor the optimisation of space utilisation for loaded Unit Load Devices and the belly of freighters
- Ensure aircraft searches required by the Security Programme are conducted prior to loading
- Maintain good communications with captain-in-command, Ramp - Handling Operator, Cargo Terminal Operator and the Cargo Office
- Liaise closely with the Cargo Office to provide up to date information of freighter positioning when there is disruption of schedule
- Quickly resolve issues on the ramp as required
- Ensure safe operations are maintained at times particularly during loading and unloading of freighters
- Assess the cause of any delay and provide recommendations to the immediate supervisor on accountability for the cause and solution
- Monitor the acceptance and release of such special cargo as animals, engine, vehicle, bulky shipment, and odd-sized items
- Coordinate the activities in the warehouse and conduct quality checks on cargo handling from the Cargo Terminal Operator and the Ramp Handling Operator
- Any other reasonable task as requested

Safety, Security and Compliance: 
- Help to ensure compliance and conformance to all regulatory and internal safety, security, quality, and procedural requirements
- Undertake quality check programmes established by Head Office and participate in audits as required
- Support the Emergency and Accident role as required
- May be designated Operational Duty Holder for the station as required
Job Requirement:
Academic Qualifications: 
- Bachelor degree graduation Knowledge, Skills, Training and Experience
- Minimum 2 years’ experience in the cargo industry is an advantage
- Strong communication skills
- Natural customer service orientation
- Attentive to detail
- Knowledge of MS Word, Excel and PowerPoint

Join DKSH.DKSH’s strength lies in our great diversity of services, industries, clients, products, regions and employees from various nationalities. We are proud of our people: they are the reason we are successful. Our people are the best in the industry. They are passionate about their career growth and about business success. Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Job Description: -Leads the overall management of building highly complex PCBA assemblies to include planning of production, kitting of material, inventory control, manufacturing processes, people management, training, safety and cost management.-Oversee the improvement of the operational efficiencies, yields, capital investment, capacity management as well as basic KPI's such as cost, quality, schedule, safety and 5S.-Implement and utilize LEAN process flow, high OEE, use of 6 sigma processes, scrap reduction and engineering improvements.-Must understand demand planning, analysis of material shortages and all activities required to meet schedule requirements.-Responsible to work with peer organizations to improve product quality, yields, DPMO reductions, proper Root Cause and corrective action and QRQC.-Able to work directly with customer to report as quired all aspects of production and execution.-Supports senior management by creating and maintaining necessary reports to demonstrate KPI improvement through analysis and graphical techniques.-Liaise with other department and personnel accomplishment  of set goals and KPI.
Job Requirement: -Bachelor or higher in Mechanical or Electrical/Electronic-Have 8-10 experience with SMT operations, engineering from manufacturing environment.-Skills in PCB Fabrication process and PCBA assembly process, Valor DFM, EDA software, PCBA failure analysis which include solder joint cross section, CSAM, microstructure analysis through SEM/EDX, All IPC standards and J Standards related to PCB and PCBA statistical tool (SPC)- Good English communication skills
Company Profile:
SVI, A global Electronics Manufacturing Services (EMS) provider of full turnkey PCBA and box-build contract manufacturing services. The Company HQ based in Thailand and our new Factory in PPSEZ economic zone (12 KM from International Airport) in Phnom Penh, Cambodia.  We serve several top tier International companies, mostly in the industrial and professional electronic equipment sectors.

We are well positioned for growth with our regional presence that enables manufacturing excellence through a network of facilities situated in key markets & geographies that in turn provide its customers with the resources, technology and capacity to optimize their operations and cost.
