company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEW- Build and deepen relationships with existing Priority Customers to achieve increase in share of wallet and revenues.- Provide professional customer service to achieve a high percentage of customer satisfaction and retention.- Serve as the one-point contact to the High Net Worth customers of the Bank SALES- Generate new business to achieve defined targets in terms of no. of customers, volumes and revenue for the segment- Achieve “best in class” productivity in order to maximize the efficacy of the sales process.- Aggressive Sales call plans to acquire large prospective customers through referrals.- Ensure coverage of customer base in accordance with the approved contact plans.- Update & maintain all Sales MIS (Calls, Prospects, Business done, etc.)- Responsible for the primary duty to increase the customer base by attracting more loan customers.- Responsible for all the steps necessary to process the loan appraisal of every loan application, inspecting customers’ business regularly at site and follow-up on collateral issues according to the rules and regulation of the Bank- Monitoring daily work timely and effectively, loan files have to be up to date and current to ensure its high quality, NPL have to be closely monitored and rehabilitate and NPL ratio kept at an acceptable level. All bank assets and liabilities related to loans, guarantees confirmation and other loan products need to be properly documented, recorded and accounted for.- Report monthly result of work pertaining to the credit appraisal approval or declination, loan monitoring, checklist matters, NPL loan ratio and loan default in principal and interest to the Head of Credit Department and the Credit Committee through SME Banking Head.- Maintain a close relationship with the customers to ensure that the customer banking needs are met. Take steps to increase the products holding of the customers.- Monitoring daily loan late by pushing ROs to closely follow up on time payment.- Monitor and check regularly on customers concerning the use of loan, business situation, loan contract terms, the repayment of loan, the completeness of documentation on time and to process possible extension of the loan before due date within 7 working days.- Resolve every issues and quires of the customers related to the loan procedures andformalities- Provide support to the customer as much as possible to procure loans and by helping themwith paperwork- Provide training/coaching to the new ROs hiring to adapt of the bank implementation/regulation- Sharing the new Memo information of the bank to all staff under my supervision- Lead marketing resources to generate new customers and clients for the Bank as group and team.- Keep proper records and look into customer complaints- Execute other related duties as assigned by line supervisors or requested.
Job Requirement: - Hold Bachelor's degree of Management, Accounting,- At least 4 years experiences in banks or MFIs;- Understand about vision, mission, core values, regulations, and other principles of SME Bank of Cambodia;** Skills & Abilities- Be a good team player with a sense of responsibility and adaptability;- Working knowledge of administrative functions in an operational environment e.g. budgets, personnel administration;- Demonstrated experience in managing and motivating a team;- Strong analytical, interpersonal, communication and influencing skills;- Ability to use initiative, prioritize, multi-task, and work well under pressure to meet deadlines;- Ability to delegate effectively amongst teams and show commitment to the long-term development of the management team through coaching and mentoring;- Broad understanding how bank operates and customer service manager workflowOthers- Be a Cambodia citizen with a strong background in Banking and Financial Management;- Be high integrity, accountability, and commitment;- Be respectful;- Demonstrate sound professional ethic.

Job Description: អំពីក្រុមហ៊ុន ៖អឹបេន ហាប់ (ខេមបូឌា) ឯ.ក ជាក្រុមហ៊ុនគ្រប់គ្រងលើគម្រោងអគារសហកម្មសិទ្ធអឹបេន វីលិច ភ្នំពេញ និងការិយាល័យធ្វើការរួម ហ្វេកតូរី ភ្នំពេញ។ យើងកំពុងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកដូចខាងក្រោម៖១) អ្នកសំអាត នៅ ខុនដូ (ប្រុស និង ស្រី)- សម្អាតទីធ្លាក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន- រក្សាអនាម័យក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន - រៀបចំទុកដាក់ឲមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់- ការងារផ្សេងៗដែលដាក់ឲពីថ្នាក់លើអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖-ទទួលបានប្រាក់ខែគោលសមរម្យ -ទទួលបានប្រាក់អតីតភាព-មានការតម្លើងប្រាក់ខែទៅតាមឆ្នាំ ​​-បសស-ឈប់សម្រាកទៅតាមច្បាប់ការងារ-ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភវេនយប់-មានកម្មវិធីជប់លៀងផ្សេងៗ។
Job Requirement: -មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ដល់ 50 ឆ្នាំ-ចេះអាននិងសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបានខ្លះមានឬគ្មានបទពិសោធន៍អាចដាក់ពាក្យបាន-មានអត្តចរិតស្មោះត្រង់ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់លើការងារ-មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និងរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description: Key Responsibilities• Develops and maintains a positive relationship with members and team mates.• Welcome and registering member, guest, visitor and meeting room booking.• Answering via Telephone call/Email/Telegram/FB page.• Daily space checks for cleanliness, maintenance, and safety.• Check/Records schedule by maintaining calendars for Customer/a member booking the meeting room.• Meeting room set-up includes equipment/stationery and meeting arranging, space layout to suit the client request.• Carry out administrative duties such as filling, typing, copying, scanning, etc.• Supports office supplies inventory by checking stock to determine inventory level.• Keep and record all the necessary documents of companies in both soft and hard copies in the categoricalorder and keep information confidential.• Draft and propose event plan to ensure community activation and support by line supervisor.• Prepared weekly update on community issues/ feedback to the team of activities, progress and needs.• Other duties that may be instructed from time to time by immediate supervisor on a daily basis.

Job Description:
• Assist to manage and lead the MEP team in processes related to MEP design between stakeholders which includes but not limited to presentation, confirmation, approval, etc.
• Manage coordination for MEP design in all stages between all stakeholders; concept, schematic, design development, tender, project implementation and post completion.
• Initiate and lead MEP research to understand latest design trends in market.
• Identify MEP design concept and develop design brief outlining design requirements to consultants
• Provide support on liaison with authorities on MEP matters.
• Facilitate and conduct MEP design document and technical review.
• Review and verify MEP design, calculations and specifications on the functionality, practicality, constructability and value-engineering aspects are complied.
• Review and ensure MEP design is compliant to regulatory and statutory requirement and is according to design brief.
• Facilitate interaction between consultants and contractor on site to resolve design and construction technical issues.
• Perform other tasks assigned by Senior Management.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering
• At least 7-year experience as a Mechanical or Electrical Engineer in consultant (preferred) or developer firm
• Fluent in English
• Strong technical knowledge in Mechanical and Electrical Engineering for building services.
• Familiar with Code, Standards and Authority requirements.
• Proficient in industry-standard design tools & programs; AutoCAD, MS. Office
• Able to lead a team of MEP Engineers
• Able to problem-solve, decisive
• Able to work in a fast-paced environment and under pressure
• Able to multi-task and complete task in a timely manner
• Excellent communication and organizational skills, detailed oriented, disciplined
• Able to review and interpret MEP drawings, calculations, specifications and related documents

Job Description:
- Ensure staff members at the branch level meet or exceed customer expectations through excellent customer service including achievement of serving time targets for both telling and sales & service areas.
- Contribute to the development of sound profitable business by creating effective referral networks, including internal business relationships, and other local marketing activities.
- Drive the result for target of deposit and other cross-sales as defined in branch KPIs. 
- Provide induction training to staff members regularly, regular feedback discussion (one-on-one meeting) and encouragement, and maintain open communication at workplace.
- Keep a close eye on local competitors – what they do and how they perform and define the strategy to gain market shares in the assigned areas.
- Keep up to date with the bank’s products and marketing campaigns to ensure superior services provided to clients and share with staff members of the branch.
- Manage branch properties, security and cleanliness of the branch.
- Manage the branch operation to ensure that the branch is complied with our internal processes and procedures and find the remedied action to improve the loopholes and mitigate risks for our bank.
- Initiate with other projects to drive the profit or increasing fee incomes for the branch and find ways to save the operating expenses of the branch.
- Act as the BA (Brand Ambassador) of our Wing Bank Branch to build and win trust from the public and valued clients and find ways or new initiatives to increase our bank business’s opportunities as much as possible.
- Support and coach the poor performance staff to improve their performance to satisfactory level with proper record and take necessary actions to rectify the issue to uplift the branch’s performance.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in finance, banking, accounting, or any relevant field
- At least 05 years of working experiences in banking and financial services
- Leadership and management Skills
- Interpersonal and communication Skills
- Selling Skills
- Computer literacy: Ms. Office, banking systems
- Languages: Chinese, Khmer and English. Other languages would be an advantage
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
•	Monitor and ensure AR are collected on time and follow up the outstanding closely and minimized the unpaid invoices 
•	Update collection on daily basis and ensure the reconciliations are done correctly 
•	Prepare documents of AP and AR per process and filling correctly for tax declaration 
•	Manage AP, ensure invoice charges from customer are corrected and follow the requirement and paid to vendor/suppliers on time 
•	Record all payments and revenues into company designated systems 
•	Perform monthly bank reconciliation and ensure there is no errors or issues, if any it need to be fixed within the period 
•	Manage booking keeping for the company and ensure information are recorded on time and accurate 
•	Prepare Expenses, Sale and Revenue Record to submit to tax agent for monthly tax declaration 
•	Keeps on updates of taxation update, new announcement, notifications, any applicable regulation or law 
•	Ensure patent tax, annual declaration at MOC (renewal), others applicable taxed are paid, tracked and files in timely manner
•	Prepare AR and AP report for weekly meeting with management for weekly meeting 
•	Prepare other reports as required under Account and Finance department 
•	Record and maintain fix asset list for depreciation purpose
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in accounting or related field.
• Minimum 3 years of experiences in accounting field.
• Fully understanding Cambodian Taxation Law.
• Be able to manage multi tasks of accounting and tax.
• Honest, high commitment and work ethic.
• Able to work independently and under to meet dateline.
• Good computer knowledge, system, Word/Excel, E-mails outlook, Peachtree

Job Description: - Work with relevant stakeholders to plan application testing and remediation.- Conduct periodic app/API scans to find any vulnerability.- Conduct secure code scanning, dependency, class, or library scanning.- Conduct application penetration test. - Analyze coding threats, evaluating encryption options and auditing permissions and access rights.- Developing, adding, and testing security features within applications to prevent security vulnerabilities against threats such as unauthorized access and modification. - Conduct threats modelling and maintain report.- Review and provide input on application security architecture, features and design.- Participating in software development process to ensure apps develop is in secure manner. - Research, develop and recommend tools to assist in secure development process. - Provide secure application training to workforces on software/application security standards, threats, and secure coding. - Scanning and exploiting systems weakness, flaw, design, and configuration settings. - Crack, decompile or reverse engineering applications to find weakness and provide solutions.- Conducts regular and careful security assessment on existing and new systems.- Create and maintain testing reports.- Manage and maintain application asset inventory.
Job Requirement: - Graduated bachelor degree of Information Technology, preferably in the field of Computer Science.- Completed or certified any security course like PenTest+, CEH- Self-learning any security related course or own lab development is advantaged.- An adversarial mindset, highly ethical, Curiosity, problem solving mentality, critical thinking, analytics kill and scepticism skill.- Knowledge of the MITRE ATT&CK framework- Knowledge of OWASP top 10 CI/CD security risks.- Knowledge of Top 25 Most Dangerous Software Weaknesses- Knowledge of OWASP top 10 web/API and cloud security risk- Understanding CVE, CWE, CPACE, CVSS- Knowledge or Experience in programming language such as PHP, Java, JavaScript, shell scripting, PowerShell, python.- Knowledge or experience in secure development frameworks. - Knowledge or experience of mobile development such as Android and IOS. - Basic knowledge or experience in networking and understanding of OSI/TCP-IP model. - Basic knowledge of programming languages or scripting. - Basic knowledge or experience in penetration testing or vulnerability scanning.- Basic or experience of DevOps and DevSecOps is a plus. - Knowledge or experienced in operating system such windows, Linux- Knowledge or experience in virtualization, containers

position: ប្រធានស្ថានីយ៍
Job Description: 1.គ្រប់គ្រង ដឹកនាំ ចាត់ចែងការងារប្រតិបត្តិការប្រចាំថ្ងៃក្នុងស្ថានីយ ក្នុងន័យ ធានាអោយបាននូវរលូននៃប្រតិបត្តិការអាជីវកម្ម របស់ស្ថានីយ។2.រៀបចំផែនការគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកទំនិញគ្រប់ប្រភេទ (ប្រេងរាវ ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន ហ្គាស មីនីម៉ាត) ដែលមាននៅក្នុងស្ថានីយអោយបានល្អ និងអាចធានាពីផ្គត់ផ្គង់ទាន់ពេលជូនអតិថិជន។3.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធានាអោយបានពីភាពត្រឹមត្រូវនៃរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំវេននិងផ្តលព៌ត័មានការលក់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។4.ត្រូវបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលបុគ្គលិកក្រោមឳវាទរបស់ខ្លួនទាំងអស់ អោយយល់ច្បាសពីការងារ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងាររៀងៗខ្លួន។5.ត្រូវធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ភ្លាមៗលើហេតុការណ៍នានាដែលអាចនឹងកើតឬកើតមានឡើងតាមស្ថានីយ។6.ប្រធានស្ថានីយត្រូវរៀបចំពេលវេលាធ្វើការបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់របស់ខ្លួនអោយបានល្អ ជាពិសេសករណីបុគ្គលិកអនុប្រធានស្ថានីយឈប់សម្រាក់ សាម៉ីខ្លួនត្រូវធានាក្នុងការមកបំពេញការងារក្នុងស្ថានីយអោយបានរលូនល្អ។7.ត្រូវពិនិត្យឯកសណ្ឋាន និងពាកកាតអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមស្តង់ដារនិងតួនាទីរបស់ខ្លួន។8.ត្រូវពិនិត្យការលក់ទៅតាមតម្លៃ អត្រាប្តូរប្រាក់ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានកំណត់9.ត្រូវគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិក្នុងស្ថានីយក្នុងករណីបាត់បង់ឬខូចខាតណាមួយដែលបង្ករឡើងក្នុងស្ថានីយត្រូវទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះក្រុមហ៊ុន។
Job Requirement: 1.	មានបរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬសញ្ញាបត្រប្រហាក់ប្រហែល.2.	មានចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងទៅនឹងផ្នែកទីផ្សារយ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំ3.	អាយុចាប់ពី 25ឆ្នាំ - 38ឆ្នាំ4.	មានជំនាញក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងច្បាស់លាស់ និងមានភាពវៃឆ្លាតក្នុងការដឹកនាំ5.	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសារខ្មែរ និង អង់គ្លេសបានល្អប្រសើរ (អាចប្រើភាសាវៀតណាមបានកាន់តែប្រសើរ)6.	មានជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រ(Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet Email)7.	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារ,ធ្វើការការជាក្រុមបានល្អ,រូសរាយ,ស្មោះត្រង់,មានគំនិតឆ្នៃប្រឌិត,នឹងមានសមត្ថភាពដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។+អត្ថប្រយោជន៍-ប្រាក់ខែសមរម្យ-ការវាយតម្លៃតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀរវត្សន៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ (Seniority pay)-ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារនឹងសុខភាព-ឱកាសដំឡើងតំណែង-ឱកាសរៀននឹងបណ្តុះបណ្តាល-បរិយាកាសការងារល្អ-ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភទូរស័ព្ទ(phone allowance)
Company Profile: Sokimex started from a humble beginning when the country was just waking up from a bleak chapter in her history. In this state, the company has to have two vital characteristic in order to prevail. Confidence and courage. Today we have developed a third trait in the company’s philosophy and that is Vision. We have confidence in our people, our partners and the free market. We have full confidence in the development of the country as long as it will take. Our confidence is shown in our eagerness to invest in long term projects and infrastructures. We do not like to go into short term projects because it will distract us from our long term goals. We invest in our people through education and knowledge. At the same time we have confidence in the Cambodian people to shape a progressive society. Our customers are also our long term business partners for without their continued support we will not grow and prosper. Without courage we will not be where we are today. We are proud we possess the courage to invest in large projects where others may shy away because it’s too risky. It’s not because we love to take risk but we have confidence in the people and country. We manage our risk with detailed analysis. It takes courage to deal in areas outside our core business. But we take it as a learning experience. We will not hesitate to draw in the best of talents both local and foreign to achieve our goals. And we go about it professionally and with honesty. We do not plan our business based on a five year plan, our vision is far longer. We forecast our business by the decades in the future because without doing so we might not be prepared for change. Just like in the glorious Angkorian era, the Angkor Wat was not build in a few years but it took generations of leaders with great vision over centuries to create something that last for ages. We represent the new Cambodian spirit 15 years after inception.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  0975626263 / 0885817999 /0714000703 recruitment@sokimex.com.kh Villa No. 22, Street Kramounsar, Sangkat Phsar Thmey II, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 0975626263 / 0885817999 /0714000703

job title: ប្រធានស្ថានីយ៍
position: ប្រធានស្ថានីយ៍
Job Description: 1.គ្រប់គ្រង ដឹកនាំ ចាត់ចែងការងារប្រតិបត្តិការប្រចាំថ្ងៃក្នុងស្ថានីយ ក្នុងន័យ ធានាអោយបាននូវរលូននៃប្រតិបត្តិការអាជីវកម្ម របស់ស្ថានីយ។2.រៀបចំផែនការគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកទំនិញគ្រប់ប្រភេទ (ប្រេងរាវ ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន ហ្គាស មីនីម៉ាត) ដែលមាននៅក្នុងស្ថានីយអោយបានល្អ និងអាចធានាពីផ្គត់ផ្គង់ទាន់ពេលជូនអតិថិជន។3.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធានាអោយបានពីភាពត្រឹមត្រូវនៃរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំវេននិងផ្តលព៌ត័មានការលក់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។4.ត្រូវបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលបុគ្គលិកក្រោមឳវាទរបស់ខ្លួនទាំងអស់ អោយយល់ច្បាសពីការងារ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងាររៀងៗខ្លួន។5.ត្រូវធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ភ្លាមៗលើហេតុការណ៍នានាដែលអាចនឹងកើតឬកើតមានឡើងតាមស្ថានីយ។6.ប្រធានស្ថានីយត្រូវរៀបចំពេលវេលាធ្វើការបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់របស់ខ្លួនអោយបានល្អ ជាពិសេសករណីបុគ្គលិកអនុប្រធានស្ថានីយឈប់សម្រាក់ សាម៉ីខ្លួនត្រូវធានាក្នុងការមកបំពេញការងារក្នុងស្ថានីយអោយបានរលូនល្អ។7.ត្រូវពិនិត្យឯកសណ្ឋាន និងពាកកាតអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមស្តង់ដារនិងតួនាទីរបស់ខ្លួន។8.ត្រូវពិនិត្យការលក់ទៅតាមតម្លៃ អត្រាប្តូរប្រាក់ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានកំណត់9.ត្រូវគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិក្នុងស្ថានីយក្នុងករណីបាត់បង់ឬខូចខាតណាមួយដែលបង្ករឡើងក្នុងស្ថានីយត្រូវទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះក្រុមហ៊ុន។
Job Requirement: 1.	មានបរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬសញ្ញាបត្រប្រហាក់ប្រហែល.2.	មានចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងទៅនឹងផ្នែកទីផ្សារយ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំ3.	អាយុចាប់ពី 25ឆ្នាំ - 38ឆ្នាំ4.	មានជំនាញក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងច្បាស់លាស់ និងមានភាពវៃឆ្លាតក្នុងការដឹកនាំ5.	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសារខ្មែរ និង អង់គ្លេសបានល្អប្រសើរ (អាចប្រើភាសាវៀតណាមបានកាន់តែប្រសើរ)6.	មានជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រ(Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet Email)7.	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារ,ធ្វើការការជាក្រុមបានល្អ,រូសរាយ,ស្មោះត្រង់,មានគំនិតឆ្នៃប្រឌិត,នឹងមានសមត្ថភាពដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។+អត្ថប្រយោជន៍-ប្រាក់ខែសមរម្យ-ការវាយតម្លៃតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀរវត្សន៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ (Seniority pay)-ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារនឹងសុខភាព-ឱកាសដំឡើងតំណែង-ឱកាសរៀននឹងបណ្តុះបណ្តាល-បរិយាកាសការងារល្អ-ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភទូរស័ព្ទ(phone allowance)
Company Profile: Sokimex started from a humble beginning when the country was just waking up from a bleak chapter in her history. In this state, the company has to have two vital characteristic in order to prevail. Confidence and courage. Today we have developed a third trait in the company’s philosophy and that is Vision. We have confidence in our people, our partners and the free market. We have full confidence in the development of the country as long as it will take. Our confidence is shown in our eagerness to invest in long term projects and infrastructures. We do not like to go into short term projects because it will distract us from our long term goals. We invest in our people through education and knowledge. At the same time we have confidence in the Cambodian people to shape a progressive society. Our customers are also our long term business partners for without their continued support we will not grow and prosper. Without courage we will not be where we are today. We are proud we possess the courage to invest in large projects where others may shy away because it’s too risky. It’s not because we love to take risk but we have confidence in the people and country. We manage our risk with detailed analysis. It takes courage to deal in areas outside our core business. But we take it as a learning experience. We will not hesitate to draw in the best of talents both local and foreign to achieve our goals. And we go about it professionally and with honesty. Just like in the glorious Angkorian era, the Angkor Wat was not build in a few years but it took generations of leaders with great vision over centuries to create something that last for ages. We represent the new Cambodian spirit 15 years after inception.

job title: ប្រធានស្ថានីយ៍ (សាខាព្រែកព្នៅ)
position: ប្រធានស្ថានីយ៍ (សាខាព្រែកព្នៅ)
Job Description: 1.គ្រប់គ្រង ដឹកនាំ ចាត់ចែងការងារប្រតិបត្តិការប្រចាំថ្ងៃក្នុងស្ថានីយ ក្នុងន័យ ធានាអោយបាននូវរលូននៃប្រតិបត្តិការអាជីវកម្ម របស់ស្ថានីយ។2.រៀបចំផែនការគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកទំនិញគ្រប់ប្រភេទ (ប្រេងរាវ ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន ហ្គាស មីនីម៉ាត) ដែលមាននៅក្នុងស្ថានីយអោយបានល្អ និងអាចធានាពីផ្គត់ផ្គង់ទាន់ពេលជូនអតិថិជន។3.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធានាអោយបានពីភាពត្រឹមត្រូវនៃរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំវេននិងផ្តលព៌ត័មានការលក់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។4.ត្រូវបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលបុគ្គលិកក្រោមឳវាទរបស់ខ្លួនទាំងអស់ អោយយល់ច្បាសពីការងារ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងាររៀងៗខ្លួន។5.ត្រូវធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ភ្លាមៗលើហេតុការណ៍នានាដែលអាចនឹងកើតឬកើតមានឡើងតាមស្ថានីយ។6.ប្រធានស្ថានីយត្រូវរៀបចំពេលវេលាធ្វើការបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់របស់ខ្លួនអោយបានល្អ ជាពិសេសករណីបុគ្គលិកអនុប្រធានស្ថានីយឈប់សម្រាក់ សាម៉ីខ្លួនត្រូវធានាក្នុងការមកបំពេញការងារក្នុងស្ថានីយអោយបានរលូនល្អ។7.ត្រូវពិនិត្យឯកសណ្ឋាន និងពាកកាតអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមស្តង់ដារនិងតួនាទីរបស់ខ្លួន។8.ត្រូវពិនិត្យការលក់ទៅតាមតម្លៃ អត្រាប្តូរប្រាក់ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានកំណត់
Job Requirement: 1.មានបរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬសញ្ញាបត្រប្រហាក់ប្រហែល.2.មានចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងទៅនឹងផ្នែកទីផ្សារយ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំ3.អាយុចាប់ពី 25ឆ្នាំ - 38ឆ្នាំ4.មានជំនាញក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងច្បាស់លាស់ និងមានភាពវៃឆ្លាតក្នុងការដឹកនាំ5.អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសារខ្មែរ និង អង់គ្លេសបានល្អប្រសើរ (អាចប្រើភាសាវៀតណាមបានកាន់តែប្រសើរ)6.មានជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រ(Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet Email)7.មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារ,ធ្វើការការជាក្រុមបានល្អ,រូសរាយ,ស្មោះត្រង់,មានគំនិតឆ្នៃប្រឌិត,នឹងមានសមត្ថភាពដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។+អត្ថប្រយោជន៍-ប្រាក់ខែសមរម្យ-ការវាយតម្លៃតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀរវត្សន៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ (Seniority pay)-ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារនឹងសុខភាព-ឱកាសដំឡើងតំណែង-ឱកាសរៀននឹងបណ្តុះបណ្តាល-បរិយាកាសការងារល្អ-ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភទូរស័ព្ទ(phone allowance)
Company Profile: Sokimex started from a humble beginning when the country was just waking up from a bleak chapter in her history. In this state, the company has to have two vital characteristic in order to prevail. Confidence and courage. Today we have developed a third trait in the company’s philosophy and that is Vision. We have confidence in our people, our partners and the free market. We have full confidence in the development of the country as long as it will take. Our confidence is shown in our eagerness to invest in long term projects and infrastructures. We do not like to go into short term projects because it will distract us from our long term goals. We invest in our people through education and knowledge. At the same time we have confidence in the Cambodian people to shape a progressive society. Our customers are also our long term business partners for without their continued support we will not grow and prosper. Without courage we will not be where we are today. We are proud we possess the courage to invest in large projects where others may shy away because it’s too risky. It’s not because we love to take risk but we have confidence in the people and country. We manage our risk with detailed analysis. It takes courage to deal in areas outside our core business. But we take it as a learning experience. We will not hesitate to draw in the best of talents both local and foreign to achieve our goals. And we go about it professionally and with honesty. We do not plan our business based on a five year plan, our vision is far longer. We forecast our business by the decades in the future because without doing so we might not be prepared for change. Just like in the glorious Angkorian era, the Angkor Wat was not build in a few years but it took generations of leaders with great vision over centuries to create something that last for ages. We represent the new Cambodian spirit 15 years after inception.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  0975626263 / 0885817999 /0714000703 recruitment@sokimex.com.kh Villa No. 22, Street Kramounsar, Sangkat Phsar Thmey II, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 0975626263 / 0885817999 /0714000703

Job Description: -Maintain all accounting source documents and good use of accounting system-Establish detail guidelines and procedures on all financial accounting in accordance with the Company policy-Supervise all accounting activities and provide guidance to accounting staff in all areas of work. -Ensure accuracy of all reports submitted by others accounting staff-Review all transaction record (cash and Cash equivalence, AR, AP etc)-Assist with analysing financial statement on a monthly basis and report any variance to the concerned department heads.-Prepare inter-company accounts reconciliation and transaction.-Assist with financial and tax audits.-Keep databases in check and filing requirement.-Overview and Ensure accuracy all account Transaction.-Controlling and mitigating financial risk and strengthening audit requirement.-Manage yearly budget, timely and accurately handle budget preparation, implementation, monitoring, forecast, revision and closure.-Integrate and implement required financial systems, monitor, track and produce timely financial report for Management.-Responsible for ensuring compliance on local tax and others financial laws.-Manage the day to day Accounting in daily functions and timely monthly closing of accounts-Manage and control expenses, budget proposal, provision management-Other tasks which assigned by management.
Job Requirement: -Advance skill in Microsoft Office-High responsibility, Hard work, honest and good attitude-Good commend of written and spoken English-Be able to work as a team-Good interpersonal skills to work with management and others staff-Knowledge of Sun Systems is plus.-Can Speaking English or Vietnam is plus

Job Description: -ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកផលិតផលតេលសិលា ជៀសវាងការបាត់បង់ដែលបណ្ដាលមកពីការខ្ជះខ្ជាយ ឬ ការធ្វេសប្រហែសខុសលក្ខណៈបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស ។-ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការទទួលផលិតផលតេលសិលាគ្រប់ប្រភេទនាំចូលតាម នាវា-រថយន្ត និងរថភ្លើងដោយផ្អែកលើបរិមាណ និងគុណភាព ច្បាស់លាស់ ។-ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការប្រគល់ផលិតផលតេលសិលាគ្រប់ប្រភេទជូនដល់អតិថិជនខាងក្នុង ដ៏ដូចជាខាងក្រៅឲ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងប្រកបដោយភាពសន្សំសំចៃ និងប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នជានិច្ច ។-ទទួលខុសត្រូវពេលបើកចែកតាមរថយន្តជូនទៅអតិថិជន ត្រូវអនុវត្តន៍តាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស ដើម្បីការពារហានិភ័យគ្រោះអគ្គីភ័យផ្សេងៗ និងការពារគ្រោះថ្នាក់ចរាចរណ៍ក្នុងមណ្ឌលឃ្លាំងប្រេង ។-ត្រូវផ្ដល់នូវសេវាល្អជានិច្ចដល់អតិថិជនទាំងខាងក្រៅ និងខាងក្នុងគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍ក្រុមហ៊ុន ។-ត្រូវលើកកំពស់ស្មារតី និងមានឥរិយាបថចាត់ទុកអតិថិជនជាកត្តាសំខាន់ គោរពតាមគោលការណ៍ ។-ត្រូវទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអតិថិជន និងអង្គភាពពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីបង្កើតនូវទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ការពារផលប្រយោជន៍ និងការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ។-ត្រូវដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជូនអតិថិជនទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅឲ្យបានរហ័សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុង ។II-	Job Specification :-ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង ។-ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹង និងជំនាញខ្ពស់ផ្នែកប្រគល់-ទទួលផលិតផលតេលសិលា ។-ជំនាញផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងហានិភ័យអគ្គីភ័យ ។-ជំនាញផ្នែកត្រួតពិនិត្យនីវ៉ូប្រេង និងផ្ទេរប្រេងពីនាវា-រថយន្ត និងរថភ្លើងចូលពោងស្តុក ។-ជំនាញលើការវ៉ាសស្ទង់ប្រេង ។-មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងបញ្ជីស្តុកប្រេងគ្រប់ប្រភេទ ។-មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការពារសន្តិសុខ សុវត្ថិភាព និងការបង្ការបង្រ្កាបអគ្គីភ័យ ។អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖-ផ្តល់ឯកសណ្ឋានក្រុមហ៊ុន-ផ្តល់ធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពនឹងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ-ការវាយតម្លៃតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀរវត្សន៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ (Seniority pay)-ឱកាសដំឡើងតំណែង-ឱកាសរៀននឹងបណ្តុះបណ្តាល-បរិយាកាសការងារល្អ-ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
Job Requirement: -ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង ។-ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹង និងជំនាញខ្ពស់ផ្នែកប្រគល់-ទទួលផលិតផលតេលសិលា ។-ជំនាញផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងហានិភ័យអគ្គីភ័យ ។-ជំនាញផ្នែកត្រួតពិនិត្យនីវ៉ូប្រេង និងផ្ទេរប្រេងពីនាវា-រថយន្ត និងរថភ្លើងចូលពោងស្តុក ។-ជំនាញលើការវ៉ាសស្ទង់ប្រេង ។-មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងបញ្ជីស្តុកប្រេងគ្រប់ប្រភេទ ។-មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការពារសន្តិសុខ សុវត្ថិភាព និងការបង្ការបង្រ្កាបអគ្គីភ័យ ។
Company Profile: Sokimex started from a humble beginning when the country was just waking up from a bleak chapter in her history. In this state, the company has to have two vital characteristic in order to prevail. Confidence and courage. Today we have developed a third trait in the company’s philosophy and that is Vision. We have confidence in our people, our partners and the free market. We have full confidence in the development of the country as long as it will take. Our confidence is shown in our eagerness to invest in long term projects and infrastructures. We do not like to go into short term projects because it will distract us from our long term goals. We invest in our people through education and knowledge. At the same time we have confidence in the Cambodian people to shape a progressive society. Our customers are also our long term business partners for without their continued support we will not grow and prosper. Without courage we will not be where we are today. We are proud we possess the courage to invest in large projects where others may shy away because it’s too risky. It’s not because we love to take risk but we have confidence in the people and country. We manage our risk with detailed analysis. It takes courage to deal in areas outside our core business. But we take it as a learning experience. We will not hesitate to draw in the best of talents both local and foreign to achieve our goals. And we go about it professionally and with honesty. We do not plan our business based on a five year plan, our vision is far longer. We forecast our business by the decades in the future because without doing so we might not be prepared for change. Just like in the glorious Angkorian era, the Angkor Wat was not build in a few years but it took generations of leaders with great vision over centuries to create something that last for ages. We represent the new Cambodian spirit 15 years after inception.

Job Requirement: •Bachelor of Management or Equivalent.•Can speak any language is better.•At least 3years in Transportation term.•Experience in organizing and planning.•Country road experience.•Experience with truck spare part.•Knowledge, and skill with tanker repairer.•Security, Safe of delivery knowledge.•Good negotiation skills all kinds of issues.

Job Description:
- Works with IT purchasing like software, accessory of IT equipment
- Works with finance of purchasing required / service needs
- Management of offsite vendor inventories, including payment schedules and storage fees
- Releases appropriate requirements based on production needs ensuring timely delivery of raw materials.
- Manage and communicate to Logistic team for material pick up (import)

Job Requirement: - Minimum 2-3 years Experiences - Bachelor's degree in finance, IT or another related field, overseas/ local purchasing- Background from supply chain management, logistics, Brewery / food and beverage is preferred- Experience using supply chain management software and tools, including ERP- Strong understanding of the brewing industry, specific to raw materials. - Computer skills: Outlook, Microsoft Office (Words, Excel, PowerPoint)- English communication

Job Description:
Job Responsibility

●	Communicate with the students, parents, teachers and offices and supervise the students to ensure that they check in and check out properly for their classes.  

●	Work with classroom teachers to deliver lessons based on the set curriculum, including lesson planning and preparation, conducting learning and reading group activities, behavioral management, classroom organization and management as well as the use of materials.

●	Assist the assigned teacher in supervising an individual or a group of students during break time, play time, field trips other and recreational activities.    

●	Work with all stakeholders including teachers, parents, learning support team and the school management to assist students with special needs in their individual learning and inclusion programs. 

●	Take turns to carry out supporting duties such as nap time duty, meal time duty and playground duty as requested and scheduled by the management.

●	Attend meetings, training sessions, professional development activities and school events per schedule.  

●	Assist in the organization of the Parent-Teacher Conferences at the end of each term. 

●	Help to effectively maintain and manage the classroom facilities, resources, and materials. 

●	Strictly follow the school’s child protection policy.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement 

●	Cambodian national
●	University-level education, continuing or graduated, preferably in the field of education, law, international relation, science, social science and psychology.  
●	Demonstrated communication, teamwork and independent thinking skills.   
●	High-level of English proficiency   
●	Aspired to work in the field of education, particularly with young children.
●	Adaptable to changes and diverse working environments.
●	Willingness to continue learning and develop a professional career in an educational setting. 
●	Proof of reputable personal and professional integrity and records.
Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   011 555 407 hr@footprintsschool.edu.kh St. 135, No 84, Tuol Tompung, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 011 555 407

Job Description:
Main Duties: 

Cataloging and Circulation

●	Enter and describe new items accurately in the computer ILS (Integrated Library System)
●	Accurately reshelve books
●	Locate items for student or faculty use
●	Physically monitor library use by students and staff
●	Respond to inquiries and/or liaise with Literacy/Library Specialist to help answer questions
●	Check in/out books to students

Collection Development
●	Research and make suggestions on age-appropriate materials for student and/or faculty use
●	Work with vendors/suppliers to source new materials for the libraries
●	Work with the procurement teams to meet the desired deliveries

Activities and Program Development
●	Help decorate and maintain the physical library space in an attractive and welcoming manner
●	Help provide students with basic orientation lessons and library activities that promote research, reading, and writing programs. These might include activities such as story time, board games, scavenger hunts, book reviews, and anything else necessary for providing a variety of participation options to students at multiple age and grade levels.

Access Services
●	Liaise with students, parents and teachers to help ascertain their needs and interests
●	Assist students with routine search and research questions
●	Pickup and deliver items throughout the entire school campus
●	Record student information in the Library ILS such as account info, requests and overdue notices
●	Disseminate accurate and interesting information about authors and library collections in Khmer and English through written publications and word of mouth.
●	Compose routine correspondence in both English and Khmer 

Training and Development
●	Be able to follow complex instructions and step by step procedures in a reliable manner
●	Be interested in library science and professional development opportunities
●	Be able to perform basic research and evaluation of items and sources
●	Have a willingness to take personal initiative and explore personal interests within the profession
●	Develop a good general knowledge of subject categories and library workflows
●	Learn basic functions of Koha ILS Software
Job Requirement:
Desired Qualifications: 

●	Cambodian only
●	Bachelor Degree in Education, Library Studies, Communication, Language Arts or a relevant field
●	High level of English proficiency  
●	Experience using Library ILS software to perform routine work 
●	Compassionate, organized, flexible and a team player
●	Excellent record of professional and personal integrity
●	Experience/certified to teach English is a plus
●	Experience working in an international school setting is a plus

Job Description: • Perform tax planning٫ review current structure of tax returns and develop methods to optimize it.• Provide full-stack tax services and manage tax audits in the company.• Monitor all tax operations ensuring their timely completion and compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.• Interact with customers to consult them on their tax planning.• Work together with company's accounting personnel and supervise their performance.• Discover tax risks and develop countermeasures.• Maintain company's tax balances on general ledger.• Manage company's tax documentation to ensure it is accurate and up-to-date.• Help to meet all information data requests related to the tax documentation.• Coordinating and developing internal auditing processes.• Developing and implementing policies and procedures.• Supervising and conducting independent audits.• Preparing analysis for departments.• Conducting investigations on irregularities and errors.• Drafting recommendations on corrective measures.• Advising executives.• Other tasks assign by President.

job title: MEP Inspector / Boiler & Chiller Inspector/ Fire Safety Inspector
position: MEP Inspector / Boiler & Chiller Inspector/ Fire Safety Inspector
Job Description: Job Description:Bureau Veritas Cambodia is seeking an experienced MEP Inspector / Fire Safety Inspector / Boiler & Chiller Inspector to join our team. As an inspector, you will be responsible for ensuring that all MEP, fire safety, and boiler & chiller systems meet the required safety and quality standards.Key Responsibilities:• Supervise MEP work, including providing technical advice, mentoring, training, and performance management.• Conduct inspections of MEP, fire safety, and boiler & chiller systems at client sites to ensure compliance with local and international safety and quality standards.• Evaluate systems for compliance with relevant codes, standards, and regulations.• Prepare inspection reports and communicate findings to clients in a clear and concise manner.• Identify potential hazards and provide recommendations for corrective actions to ensure compliance with safety and quality standards.• Provide technical assistance to clients on MEP, fire safety, and boiler-related matters.• Perform other tasks as assigned by the supervisor.• Stay up-to-date with industry developments and changes to regulations and standards.
Job Requirement: Requirements:• Bachelor's degree in Mechanical, Electrical, or Chemical Engineering or related field.• At least 3-5 years of experience in relevant fields;• Site Inspection or supervision experience on building and/or infrastructure construction projects;• Familiar with TIC services.• Strong knowledge of relevant codes, standards, and regulations.• Strong communication skills and ability to communicate complex technical information to non-technical stakeholders.• Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.• Fluent in English and knowledge of Khmer and/or Chinese Mandarin is a plus.• Proficient in MS Office, MS Project, AutoCAD, and M&E calculation programs.• Willingness to travel to client sites as required.• Honest, trustworthy, and hardworking under pressure.
Contact Info: Contact Information Seng Sreymarch  017555638 sreymarch.seng@bureauveritas.com Phnom Penh Building 1186, St. 371 (Sola), Sk. Steung Meanchy, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh 017555638

Company Profile:
Corporate Information

yes, the FIRST and BEST Digital Service Provider, is the only telecommunication company in Cambodia with 100% 4G VoLTE network. Our network is designed for ultra-high-speed usage. With yes superior internet network, our customers can enjoy the best 4G internet xperience you deserve wherever you are in Cambodia.

Our 27 yes hub nationwide is an all-in-one xperience center to all new digital users. Our yes hub warmly welcome everyone for any support, whether it’s questions about how to use the phone, sign up for Facebook page or tips on how to run a successful YouTube channel.

yes has partnered with top global brands like YouTube, Facebook, Google, top OEMs like Apple, Samsung, Hauwei, Xiaomi, Vivo and Oppo, and top payment partners like Alipay, WeChat Pay, Union Pay, VISA and MasterCard to bring exclusive experience for our customers.

yes housed more than 1,000 employees both local and expatriate. We take pride in being inclusive, leveraging and engaging collective genius to create a positive experience in digital life for all. yes aspires everyone, our colleagues, our partners and our customers to become #DigitalCitizen by using yes network as their digital identity to communicate, access digital content and perform financial transactions.

Say yes and let’s #forwardtogether!

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Lead, develop and communicate the commercial vision, strategy, and resource requirements to successfully launch of the MJQE and subsidiaries companies under the group.• Ensure the management of all financial aspects of the company and business under the group company including budgeting, forecasting, long-range planning and overall management and accountability of the P&L.• Maintain and improve the branding of MJQE and subsidiaries companies to be successfully launch the IPO for the stock market.• Provide commercial analysis and direction for the development and management of the product pipeline and ensure current and future products are fully aligned with the needs of markets.• Regularly interact with the Founder, Chairman and CEO and research and development team regarding a wide array of topics related to current and future commercial business.• Lead all commercial launch preparation activities including brand strategy, product positioning and messaging, pricing and market access strategy, sales force strategy and resource planning.• Collaborate with President to develop business objectives and development goals.• Oversee the planning and implementation of business plans of new markets.• Oversee the sales and marketing functions of the businesses to maximize returns and expand the business brands of MJQE and subsidiaries companies under the group.• Meetings with customers to deliver sales and conduct sales of company products and services.• Conduct market research to identify developments/changes in industry trends in order to make necessary adjustments.• Establish strategic partnership with other companies to leverage on their network.• Develop, review and update relevant policies of their own units.• Review current approach to business development and make changes where necessary.• Assign sales quota and target to business development team and sales/marketing units.• Ensure business processes and standards are in accordance with regulations and policies set by appropriate authorities.• Set and enforce customer service standards to ensure clients are satisfied with received products/services.• Conduct negotiations to determine contract terms and ensure profitable deals.• Work with school program developer to ensure the school program are matched with the market demand.• Oversee the interviewing, recruitment, and training of commercial team.• Represent President or the Founder, Chairman and CEO to attend event, workshop and conference as required.• Other tasks assigned by the Founder, Chairman and CEO.
Job Requirement: • Master's degree in business administration, sales or marketing, or related fields.• More than 10 years of commercial experience, including new product planning, marketing, market analysis, sales leadership experience.• A strategic/analytical and results-driven thinker. • Demonstrated success in building commercial department and successfully launching new products.• Extensive experience with developing and executing marketing strategies and tactics, field leadership, market research and analysis and business forecasting.• Ability to work effectively in a fast-moving dynamic environment.• A resourceful and creative problem solver who will ‘roll up their sleeves’ to get the job done.• Problem-solving, and decision-making skills.• Exceptional leadership and management skills.• Effective communication and negotiation skills.• Proficient in all Microsoft Office applications.• Detail-oriented and persuasive.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: ប្រធានប្រតិបត្តិការផ្នែកផលិតកម្ម  ( 2 នាក់)
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ឈុន វ៉ាន់ឌី CHHUN VANDY CO.,LTD
position: ប្រធានប្រតិបត្តិការផ្នែកផលិតកម្ម  ( 2 នាក់)
Job Description:
•	រៀបចំផែនការ យុទ្ធសាស្ត្រ និងកាលវិភាគផលិតអោយបានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងផលិតសម្រាប់បម្រុងទុកក្នុងរោងចក្រ
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងតាមដាន ការអនុវត្តការងារ និងគ្រប់គ្រងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ អនាម័យក្នុងចង្វាក់ផលិតកម្ម
•	វិភាគលើចង្វាក់ផលិត និងវាយតម្លៃលើទិន្នផលការងារ ដើម្បីធ្វើអោយការផលិតកាន់តែប្រសើរឡើង
•	ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ផលិតប្រចាំថ្ងៃនិងប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំជូនថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងក្រុមហ៊ុន និងផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ
•	ពិនិត្យនិងកែសម្រួលទម្រង់ និងរបាយការណ៍ស្របតាមស្ថានភាព និងតម្រូវការរបស់ផ្នែកផលិតកម្ម
•	សិក្សា និងអភិវឌ្ឍ ឬស្វែងរកដំណោះស្រាយពីបញ្ហាផលិតកម្មអោយបានទាន់ពេលវេលាជាមួយផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ
•	រៀបចំផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ដល់ប្រធានក្រុម និង អនុប្រធាន ដើម្បីឲ្យអនុវត្តការងារកាន់តែមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព
•	រៀបចំកាលវិភាគ ជួសជុល និងថែទាំម៉ាស៊ីនផលិតកម្មអោយបានទៀងទាត់ជាមួយផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស (ជាង)
•	អាចធ្វើការឆ្លាស់វេនស្របតាមផែនការចង្វាក់ផលិតបាន
•	ពិនិត្យ និងវាយតម្លៃលើប្រសិទ្ធភាពការងាររបស់ប្រធានក្រុម និង អនុប្រធាន ឬកម្មករ
•	សហការជាមួយផ្នែកគុណភាព និងផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសម៉ាស៊ីន ដើម្បីឲ្យការផលិតមានគុណភាពខ្ពស់
•	ពង្រឹង និងកែតម្រូវលើគុណភាពផលិតផល ពីផ្នែកលក់ ដែលទទួលបានពត៌មានពីអតិថិជន
Job Requirement:
•	បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រគ្រប់គ្រង ឬជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ ៣ឆ្នាំ យ៉ាងតិចជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ ឬជាប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រង
•	ត្រូវមានជំនាញដឹកនាំ (Leadership Management) / ជម្រុញ និងលើកទឹកចិត្ត
•	ជាមនុស្សស្មោះត្រង់ មានវិន័យ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ទទួលខុសត្រូវ និងមានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
•	មានជំនាញដោះស្រាយ និងរបៀបធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម ដើម្បីសម្រេចតាមផែនការផលិត
•	ត្រូវចូលរួមរៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ជាមួយថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង

បេក្ខជនមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍  អាចទំនាក់ទំនងដាក់ពាក្យធ្វើការដោយភ្ជាប់នូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប(CV)អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ និង ឯកសារផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ។ ផ្លូវ៥១ ភូមិក្បាលអូរ សង្កាត់ព្រះស្រែ ក្រុងឧត្តុង្គម៉ែជ័យ ខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ

position: វិស្វករអគ្គីសនី និង វិស្វករមេកានិច ( 4 នាក់)
Job Description:
•	មានច្ចេកទេសមេកានិច តបណ្តាញខ្សែភ្លើង ឧបករណ៍ និងរង្វាស់អគ្គីសនីក្នុងរោងចក្រ
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារការថែទំា ជួសជុល ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង គ្រឿងចក្រ
•	ដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា
•	រៀបចំផែនការការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•	រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារនៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ នឹងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម 
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណភាព
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងបច្ចេកទេសមេកានិច
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារៈដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារៈអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារកុំឱ្យមានការបាត់បង់ ត្រូវសន្សុំសំចៃ
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពីចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ
•	សហការការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់ រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃនៅពេលមានតម្រូវការ
•	បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ
•	ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការងារទូទៅមួយចំនួននៃបច្ចេកទេសមេកានិចពាក់ព័ន្ធក្នុងឃ្លាំង
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់
•	ការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង
Job Requirement:
•	បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេស វិស្វករ មេកានិច អគ្គិសនី និងពាក់ព័ន្ធ
•	មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៤០ឆ្នាំ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
•	ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់
•	អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់
•	ជាមនុស្សស្មោះត្រង់ មានវិន័យ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ទទួលខុសត្រូវ និងមានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ 
•	ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឈប់ពីការងារ
•	ចេះចែករំលែករាល់ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ដែលបានទទួលទៅឱ្យបុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់បានដឹង។
•	មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
•	ការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍ តាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស
•	គុណភាពការជួសជុលម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង និងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង
•	គុណភាពការងារ
•	ការថែទាំម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង និងទូភ្លើង។

បេក្ខជនមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍  អាចទំនាក់ទំនងដាក់ពាក្យធ្វើការដោយភ្ជាប់នូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប(CV)អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ និង ឯកសារផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ។

job title: គណនេយ្យករ ( Senior Accountant )
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ឈុន វ៉ាន់ឌី CHHUN VANDY CO.,LTD
position: គណនេយ្យករ ( Senior Accountant )
Job Description:
•	រៀបចំ របាយការណ៍ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុប្រចាំខែ ដូចជារៀបចំរបាយការណ៍លទ្ធផល & របាយការណ៍ តារាងតុល្យភាព  
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវការពិនិត្យ ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ របាយការណ៌ សមតុល្យសាច់ប្រាក់ ក្នុងធនាគារ និងសមតុល្យ សាច់ប្រាក់ក្នុងបេឡាជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការរៀបចំទិន្នានុប្បវត្តិការកែតម្រូវ រំលស់អចលនទ្រព្យ  និងទិន្នុប្បវត្តិផ្សេងៗទៀត សម្រាប់ការចុះប្រតិបត្តិការគណនេយ្យក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធគណនេយ្យ Quickbooks
•	ចូលរួមក្នុងការរាប់ស្តុកទំនិញ ទទួលខុសត្រូវធ្វើរបាយការណ៌ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ការរាប់ស្តុក ទំនិញនៅរៀងរាល់ ដំណាច់ខែ និងការផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ស្តុកប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការរៀបចំរបាយការណ៌សង្ខេបប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ពីចំណូលការលក់សរុប ការលក់ជំពាក់ ការលក់-ទូទាត់សាច់ប្រាក់ របាយការណ៌អតិថិជនសងប្រាក់ របាយការណ៌ទូទាត់បំណុលអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ និងរបាយការណ៌ស្តុកនៅសល់
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរៀបចំរបាយការណ៌បំណុលពិបាកទារ បំណុលទាមិនបាន និង បំណុលហួសកាលកំណត់
•	បំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតទៅតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងនាយកគ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ
•	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការរវាយតម្លៃពន្ធសម្រាប់ប្រចាំខែ ថែរក្សា និងឯកសារពន្ធដល់នាយកដ្ឋានពន្ធដារ
Job Requirement:
•	និស្សិតមហាវិទ្យាល័យ ឬ បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ (គណនេយ្យ)
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍លើការងារក្នុងតួនាទីនេះចាប់ពី 3 ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• សញ្ញាប័ត្រសាលាជាតិពន្ធដា
•	មានចំណេះដឹងច្បាប់សារពើពន្ធ និងប្រកាសពន្ធ សេវាកម្មពន្ធផ្សេងៗ
•	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ក្លាហាន មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារ និងតួនាទី
•	គោរពពេលវេលាអោយបានទៀងទាត់មានភាពឆ្លាតវៃក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
•	សម្របខ្លួនធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងកែលំអរការងារជាប្រចាំ
•	ចេះប្រកុំព្យូទ័រ MS. Word, Excel, E-mail, Quick books.

បេក្ខជនមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍  អាចទំនាក់ទំនងដាក់ពាក្យធ្វើការដោយភ្ជាប់នូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប(CV)អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ និង ឯកសារផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ។  ផ្លូវ៥១ ភូមិក្បាលអូរ សង្កាត់ព្រះស្រែ ក្រុងឧត្តុង្គម៉ែជ័យ ខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Company Profile: Sokimex started from a humble beginning when the country was just waking up from a bleak chapter in her history. In this state, the company has to have two vital characteristic in order to prevail. Confidence and courage. Today we have developed a third trait in the company’s philosophy and that is Vision. We have confidence in our people, our partners and the free market. We have full confidence in the development of the country as long as it will take. Our confidence is shown in our eagerness to invest in long term projects and infrastructures. We do not like to go into short term projects because it will distract us from our long term goals. We invest in our people through education and knowledge. At the same time we have confidence in the Cambodian people to shape a progressive society. Our customers are also our long term business partners for without their continued support we will not grow and prosper. Without courage we will not be where we are today. We are proud we possess the courage to invest in large projects where others may shy away because it’s too risky. It’s not because we love to take risk but we have confidence in the people and country. We manage our risk with detailed analysis. It takes courage to deal in areas outside our core business. But we take it as a learning experience. We will not hesitate to draw in the best of talents both local and foreign to achieve our goals. And we go about it professionally and with honesty. We do not plan our business based on a five year plan, our vision is far longer. We forecast our business by the decades in the future because without doing so we might not be prepared for change. Just like in the glorious Angkorian era, the Angkor Wat was not build in a few years but it took generations of leaders with great vision over centuries to create something that last for ages. We represent the new Cambodian spirit 15 years after inception.

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
Main Responsibilities
Campus: Toul Tum Poung
●	Work with classroom teachers to instruct the set curriculum and assist in the preparation of the lessons, reading groups, behavioral management, classroom organization, and materials.
●	Observe the teaching styles, methods, and language used by the teacher in an effort to improve personally.
●	Ensure adequate supervision of a safe recreation and play period for the students during class recess or break times.
●	Assist with supporting students and teachers with special needs requirements.
●	Carry out other duties such as sleep room duty, lunch duty, gate duty, lunch time supervision of students, playground duty as requested and scheduled. .
●	Be available for and attend all Khmer staff meetings.
●	Be available for and attend any staff training sessions held on weekdays.
●	Be available for Parent-Teacher conferences at the end of each term which generally occur outside of working hours on a weekend.
●	Attend all school sponsored functions that occur during regular school hours, such as opening ceremony, graduation ceremony etc.
●	Attend public workshops and other events outside of regular school hours when given 2 weeks prior notice.
●	Make themselves available to speak with parents before or after classes, or when called upon by the school management to do so Maintain facilities, resources, and materials in his/her classroom and the school.
●	Perform administrative tasks as required by the school.
●	Other reasonable tasks requested by the school management.
●	Strictly follow the school’s child protection policy.
Job Requirement:
Qualification Requirements:
● Cambodian only
●	Confident in communicating with parents and teachers in both Khmer and English.
●	Passionate to work with children.
●	Willingness to learn and continue to learn personally and professionally.
●	Adaptable to changes and diverse environments.
Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   011 555 407 hr@footprintsschool.edu.kh St. 135, No 84, Tuol Tompung, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 011 555 407

organise and administer contracts, budget and expense tracking, filing, invoicing, quotations, etc.Event Space and Fairs Management (internal and external)• Support supervisor to source ongoing event programs with both internal and external tenants to maximize event spaces occupancy, increase footfall as well as revenue.• Support supervisor to document and coordinate event recaps meeting among relevant team.Tenant Management• Assist in establishing and maintaining effective communication and good relationship with tenants, including hosting monthly marketing, store manager meetings with tenants, communicating via weekly, monthly tenant sale reports.• Assist in monitoring tenants weekly sale report, analyze tenant sales results and support tenants to increase their sales by coordinating promotional activities and promoting their offers across K Mall on-site and online channels.• Assist in coordinating with retailers and co-sponsors for PR or marketing purposes, liaise on events/promotional/advertising plans to involve them with mall marketing activities.• Assist with tenants for latest in-store promotions, new product features, store launches etc to be publicized on K Mall social channels.Reporting• Assist in produce marketing weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual report.• Assist in tracking performance of K Mall-organized events and outreach.• Assist in monitoring the marketing budget on a monthly, quarterly and annual basis.• Coordinate to form report on the performance of marketing campaigns, gain insight and assess against goals.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description: • Participate in developing leasing strategy and execution plan.• Execute and ensure achieving leasing strategy through right tenant mix, maximize occupancy, maximize customer footfall, and maximize property value.• Propose, evaluate, analyze and recommend potential tenants based on long term business partnership, customer fit, growth, profit, brand popularity, and design.• Propose and recommend leasing fee and term for approved tenants.• Utilize creative solutions throughout lease negotiation and communication processes by developing multiple negotiation methods and strategies to maximize property value throughout the process.• Identify, source and secure new tenants, and work with existing right tenants to fulfil expansion/renewal requirements.• Build good tenants experience though out leasing process to ensure a smooth transition from initial engagement step till close deal.• Actively seek, listen and respond to existing tenant feedback with action to ensure alignment of their needs to our business goals.• Managing leasing administration including but not limited to leasing offer, full leasing agreement, leasing termination and renewal.• Continue to improve leasing standard process to ensure a smooth transition from the offer, close deal, fit-out/renovation, move in and billing.• Ensure compliance with the company policy all the time.• Build and sustain strong relationships with existing and potential tenants to create pipeline for future leasing opportunities and present K Mall brand to target tenants.• Connect with influential network to solicit market intelligence and market comparable.• Continue to track regularly new and movement or renewals brands in market.• Monitor leasing budget and leasing revenue to ensure alignment short and long term plan.• Collaborate and consult internally to build effective relationships across departments.• Develop leasing weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual report.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor degree in business or related discipline.• 5 years’ experience in commercial real estate and lease management (Retail leasing is preferable, office and residential leasing are advantage)• Good insight of the current retail market conditions and trend including but not limited to competitors, tenants, and customers.• Excellent business acumen• Strong negotiation and relationship building skill• Good networking in retail industry• Result oriented• Attention to detail• Be able to work in flexible schedule to handle emergencies• Ability to read and understand construction documents, and lease draw plans• Good interpersonal skills, ability to manage customer and tenant relationships• Good written and verbal communications skills• Ability to deliver effective presentations• Good at identifying, assessing and managing both risks and opportunities• Good analytical skill by interpreting financial data, lease documents and market data• Ability to collaborate, consult and build strong internal relationships within organizations• Demonstrated capacity to work under pressure and to embrace change.

We provide a supportive environment for our Urbanland superstars to continuously develop and grow professionally and personally.
